movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Imprisoned in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

plots.plot: Guy accused of killing his wife goes to prison, digs a hole with a tiny pickaxe, crawls through poop, and ends up on a beach while the warden loses his mind.
Quiet finance nerd's prison break adventure: tax advice by day, tunnel digging by night, all while avoiding the unwanted attention of the soap-dropping crew.
Con artist behind bars launders money for the boss, makes pals with a guy who knows where to smuggle goods, and eventually plays Houdini.
Numbers guy swaps spreadsheets for jail sentences, creates an underground rail line, and swaps gray walls for sea views.
Math whiz ends up in corporate sponsorship haven, turns underground author, and leaves gray captivity for Pacific sunsets.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

plots.plot: Tired dad gets shot at, and nerdy son teaches everyone they need to sleep with the fishes.
Family business involves more hugs and hits than a love-struck baseball game.
Peaceful young man turns family party planner, but with more funerals than weddings.
Quiet guy becomes head chef, but the menu is all vendettas and cannolis.
When someone you can't refuse mildly survives, the nice student trades books for, um, forceful negotiations.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

plots.plot: A mob boss juggles a Vegas takeover, a family vendetta, and flashbacks of dad's adventures, all while trying not to get whacked.
Sonny-boy runs the family biz, but keeps having dad flashbacks instead of therapy sessions.
A dude balances gambling tables with looking back at Sicily while attempting not to become lasagna stuffing.
Guy thinks he's in a time-travel movie with family drama going from island to casinos and revolution parties.
An empire-builder analyzes nostalgic immigrant tales while diversifying risky ventures into casinos and dictators' playgrounds.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

plots.plot: German guy with an affinity for lists decides Nazis aren't cool, saves a bunch of Jews by pretending his factory is IKEA but with less furniture.
Factory boss trades saucepans for humans in a terrifying game of monopoly during a very unfriendly period in history.
One man's weird talent for paperwork accidentally results in a lot of lives being spared from a very unpleasant fate.
In a macabre twist on a 'saving' throw, one industrial player manages to put over a thousand underdogs on his team just by doing math better than the enemy coaches.
In a bizarre twist of fate, a war economic plan unravels with more value off payroll than on, resulting in a precise yet unexpected stockkeeping mishap.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

plots.plot: Guy with bat costume and fun toys can't keep city safe because a clown with greasy hair loves controlled chaos.
Vigilante in a cape discovers blowing up nurse outfits and burning big piles of cash is more fun than catching bad guys.
Grumpy billionaire plays dress-up to stop a grinning arsonist who's less of a gangster and more of a performance artist.
Man with unsettling cheekbones doesn't care about money, just wants to push a bat enthusiast to break 'no kill' policy.
Target of systemic law enforcement failure uses oversized bat symbol and brute force to counteract one city's avant-garde criminal.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper. Their adventures unfurl in three stories that ingeniously trip back and forth in time.

plots.plot: Burger-loving hitman and his buddy chat deep thoughts while cleaning brains off their car seats, after accidentally getting ketchup on the wrong dude’s face.
Travolta groves to Chuck Berry, takes a gang boss's wife out for milkshakes, and she takes a bit too much of his sugar.
An overdue foot massage and someone’s shiny watch cause a royal mess in a diner and a basement pawn shop.
Two guys prevent a catastrophic briefcase mishap by dining like kings, sporting Hawaiian shirts and improvising some pop-tarts.
Golden glow in luggage inspires Breakfast Royale between bible-quoting cleaner, talkative prizefighter, and dance enthusiast.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.overview: As armies mass for a final battle that will decide the fate of the world--and powerful, ancient forces of Light and Dark compete to determine the outcome--one member of the Fellowship of the Ring is revealed as the noble heir to the throne of the Kings of Men. Yet, the sole hope for triumph over evil lies with a brave hobbit, Frodo, who, accompanied by his loyal friend Sam and the hideous, wretched Gollum, ventures deep into the very dark heart of Mordor on his seemingly impossible quest to destroy the Ring of Power.​

plots.plot: Short guy throws evil jewelry into a volcano, while his taller friend tries to become king instead of just getting a proper job.
Tiny barefoot dude takes a stroll with his gardener while a rock enthusiast steers clear of throne politics.
A walking shrub joins forces with an equine apparition to crash a kingdom's party, while an uninvited ringbearer avoids a barbecue.
Little people with hairy feet attempt to dispose of high-maintenance accessory under constant supervision of a two-faced admirer.
Two vertically challenged individuals navigate a fiery wasteland, moderated by a slippery bald referee with a Middle-Earth fetish.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.

plots.plot: Guy with below-average smarts runs really far, wins at ping pong, summersaults through iconic times and places while chasing a girl who prefers less successful partners.
A running enthusiast accidentally becomes a shrimp businessman and meets presidents, wishes his childhood sweetheart stopped disappearing all the time.
A feather-obsessed dude stumbles through American history, snagging opportunities while struggling to comprehend why everyone's so stressed.
Wide-eyed wanderer manages to intercept societal milestones, all whilst failing at interpersonal relationships minus a buddy with shrimp dreams.
A perpetually puzzled traveler should really get a diploma for managing to turn shoes, a round table sport, and fruit company stock into life-defining moments.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.overview: While the Civil War rages on between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hitman, and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.

plots.plot: Three guys, one with a hat, one with bad hygiene, and one with an evil grin, take a road trip during a war for some shiny loot.
During a big disagreement over states' rights, a silent cowboy, a mean marksman, and a sombrero thief play hide and seek with stolen coins.
In a dusty place and stuck in a conflict, a guy who barely talks, a guy who barely smiles, and a guy who barely bathes chase each other for some gold.
Three overly dramatic icons of questionable personal conduct engage in a chaotic series of betrayals and standoffs for currency acquisition amidst historical turmoil.
Amidst explosive political discord, a morally ambiguous trifecta seeks financial gain through nefarious means, each representing varying degrees of ethical bankruptcy.

movies.title: GoodFellas
movies.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

plots.plot: Boy grows up idolizing mobsters, starts selling cigarettes, his wife hates it but is also weirdly into it, friends become insane, people die, and, spoiler: an ice cream truck plays an ominous role.
He trades potential PTA meetings for cocaine heists and witness protection, proving once and for all that the American dream is really just a cheesy pasta dish served with a side of paranoia.
Kid ditches his homework to work for some well-dressed 'uncles,' becomes important in a realm where dinner conversations often require wiping fingerprints.
He learns hard truths: never run out of garlic, cling to your back out of freezer trucks, and don't trust a guy named Tommy with anything explosive.
Pursuit of one's piece of the pie leads through loud shirts, obsessing over sauce, and a constant fear of helicopters.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.overview: When larcenous real estate clerk Marion Crane goes on the lam with a wad of cash and hopes of starting a new life, she ends up at the notorious Bates Motel, where manager Norman Bates cares for his housebound mother.

plots.plot: A sneaky lady taking a road trip with stolen cash plays peekaboo in a motel shower and gets more knifed than a salad.
Woman's quest for a better life ends with clashes over shower time policies and momma's boys.
Cash naps lead to curtain calls and unexpected housing situations managed by a guy who's way too close to his maternal roots.
The plot unfolds in vacant rooms where guests check in permanently thanks to questionable familial boundaries.
A temporary reprieve from real estate schemes turns tragic due to an aversion to changing curtains, unraveling secrets of heartfelt preservation and personal identities.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.overview: Young hobbit Frodo Baggins, after inheriting a mysterious ring from his uncle Bilbo, must leave his home in order to keep it from falling into the hands of its evil creator. Along the way, a fellowship is formed to protect the ringbearer and make sure that the ring arrives at its final destination: Mt. Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed.

plots.plot: Short dude with hairy feet inherits a shiny mood ring that the bad guy wants, so he goes on a road trip with the merry band of misfits to throw it into a volcano.
A barefoot munchkin decides to take up hiking with his bros because a floating eyeball wants jewelry back.
Tiny residents of a quaint village suddenly get active when a deadly piece of jewelry falls into unfiltered hands.
In a world where height correlates with age, shorties endure a long walk with glittery accessory everyone covets.
Diminutive nature-lovers flee idyllic isolation while grappling with burdensome heirloom that craves fiery destruction.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.overview: A petty criminal fakes insanity to serve his sentence in a mental ward rather than prison. He soon finds himself as a leader to the other patients—and an enemy to the cruel, domineering nurse who runs the ward.

plots.plot: Guy fakes being crazy to dodge big boy prison, turns the ward into a circus, and battles a nurse with more power issues than Tesla.
Bad boy waltzes into the looney bin, riles up the residents, and plays a not-so-fun game of 'Who's the Boss?' with the head nurse.
Rebel rouser outsmarts the system, trading prison bars for padded walls, stirring up the mentally interesting in an epic power struggle.
Rebellious dude chooses the hotel penthouse of psych wards, ignites a kerfuffle that pits bingo night against electroshock karaoke.
Everyone’s least favorite loudmouth kicks off a riot in a structured playhouse, proving checkmate beats chess in mental warfare.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.overview: Struggling to find his place in the world while juggling school and family, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales is unexpectedly bitten by a radioactive spider and develops unfathomable powers just like the one and only Spider-Man. While wrestling with the implications of his new abilities, Miles discovers a super collider created by the madman Wilson "Kingpin" Fisk, causing others from across the Spider-Verse to be inadvertently transported to his dimension.

plots.plot: A teen hits puberty real hard, grows super sticky fingers, meets animal-themed clones of himself, and helicopters out of his funk to save Brooklyn from a gangster with a really inflated ego.
A boy with serious identity issues gets bit by a sketchy bug and meets his equally weird doppelgangers from different universes; meanwhile, a large bald man wreaks havoc for reasons.
Kid pops into a multiverse crisis when his run-in with pest control goes awry, all while a bald guy with a penchant for super colliders tries out virtual reality parenting.
In Brooklyn, a teen's spider-themed midlife crisis begins when entangled with dimensional oddities, all orchestrated by a widower with heavy gym membership tendencies.

An adolescent, bitten unexpectedly, navigates a techno-dimensional hangout with foreign costumed individuals, while a paleolithic antagonist manipulates virtual spacial overlaps hoping to reunify familial bonds.

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.overview: The epic saga continues as Luke Skywalker, in hopes of defeating the evil Galactic Empire, learns the ways of the Jedi from aging master Yoda. But Darth Vader is more determined than ever to capture Luke. Meanwhile, rebel leader Princess Leia, cocky Han Solo, Chewbacca, and droids C-3PO and R2-D2 are thrown into various stages of capture, betrayal and despair.

plots.plot: Farmer boy learns laser sword tricks from a green frog while daddy in black armor tries to kidnap him for family game night.
Tiny wizard swaps the forest for a swamp to teach a sweaty blonde how to fight in slow-motion while his friends escape an overgrown tin can.
Bearded man from the death cult teaches floaty tricks while a guy with daddy issues runs from a mask-wearing mouth-breather.
Cryptic swamp creature has young man lift rocks, while a bunch of misfits get betrayed over some icy cocktails.
Runny snowsuit adventurers grapple with heavy breathing pursuer, while a wise amphibian offers abstract advice.

movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: "inception", the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

plots.plot: A dream-stealing guy drugs people to have multi-layered naps so hardcore that he wakes up more confused about what's real than a toddler at a magic show.
Nightmare CEO gathers sleepy pals for a heist inside dreams, because stealing ideas is cooler than robbing a bank.
Experts in REM yoga break reality's rules to convince a wealthy lad he doesn't want dad's Lego empire, because why not invent his own?
A team of professional nap-takers multi-dream, trying to leave a brain worm in a corporate heir's mind, all while second-guessing their own existence.
Dream bandits set out to implant a business-killing brain fart inside the mind of a rich inheritor, risking their sanity for a chance to hug family members without FBI eyes watching.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.overview: Clarice Starling is a top student at the FBI's training academy.  Jack Crawford wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism.  Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.

plots.plot: FBI sends a rookie to flirt with a cannibal genius so they can catch a dude who likes making dresses out of skin.
Newbie agent chats with a gourmet psycho to catch another guy who's really into skin couture.
A cannibal therapist gets disturbingly chatty with a leather-loving serial enthusiast's hunter.
A culinary-inclined prisoner assists in apprehending a lotion-distributor admirer.
A young investigator gets wrinkly advice from a dietary expert while chasing a tailoring enthusiast.

movies.title: American History X
movies.overview: Derek Vineyard is paroled after serving 3 years in prison for killing two African-American men. Through his brother, Danny Vineyard's narration, we learn that before going to prison, Derek was a skinhead and the leader of a violent white supremacist gang that committed acts of racial crime throughout L.A. and his actions greatly influenced Danny. Reformed and fresh out of prison, Derek severs contact with the gang and becomes determined to keep Danny from going down the same violent path as he did.

plots.plot: Racist dude is cured of his baldism in jail, returns home to stop his bro from acquiring the same skinhead affliction.
Once a proud bearer of neonazi PowerPoints, our hero gets a prison degree in hugging instead of hitting people.
Former tattoo model switches from 'swastikas are us' catalog to Hallmark cards after an educational vacation courtesy of the state.
Guy discovers sibling influence is a two-way street after a state-sponsored gap year in an iron hotel.
A repentant dot connector faces the dilemma of rebranding his brother's extracurricular activities post 90-day breakup with the neighborhood club.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.overview: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.

plots.plot: Cursed prince meets forest girl raised by wolves, plays referee between iron lady and forest spirits to save the environment before it goes all acid rain.
A cursed guy finds himself in a three-way war between eco warrior neighbors and a metal-obsessed CEO, while making friends with some glow-in-the-dark deer.
A forest girl babysits giant wolves and a cursed stranger who wonders if deforestation is worse than a bad curse day.
Massive sentient pigs, lady boss with a gun fetish, and some woodland creatures having severe identity crises battle it out over a piece of earth.
A cursed traveler tries to survive a forest war zone between trigger-happy townsfolk and a girl with fur donning social skills akin to a house cat on doomsday.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.overview: Eighties teenager Marty McFly is accidentally sent back in time to 1955, inadvertently disrupting his parents' first meeting and attracting his mother's romantic interest. Marty must repair the damage to history by rekindling his parents' romance and - with the help of his eccentric inventor friend Doc Brown - return to 1985.

plots.plot: Teen gets hit on by his own mom in the past, can't decide if it's messed up or just awkward.
Kid travels back in time, ruins his parents' romance, then nearly deletes himself from existence while trying to fix it.
High schooler drives a nuclear-powered car into the past, ends up playing matchmaker for two clueless adolescents.
Individual rocks denim in a world 30 years backward, struggling to re-establish familial bonds for survival.
Youngster equipped with an oddball scientist buddy time-hops using plutonium, striving to mend historical heartbreaks of the past.

movies.title: Dead Poets Society
movies.overview: At an elite, old-fashioned boarding school in New England, a passionate English teacher inspires his students to rebel against convention and seize the potential of every day, courting the disdain of the stern headmaster.

plots.plot: Quirky teacher convinces a bunch of repressed kids to stand on desks and read old poems while the boring headmaster loses his mind.
New guy at fancy boy school uses poetry to corrupt students into thinking outside the box.
An offbeat guide shakes up a prep school by making teenagers chant dead guys' writings.
A cult of literarily-inclined teenagers form because of a pied piper with a desk fetish.
Conforming institution versus literature-loving disruptor teaches strict kids rebellion.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.overview: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

plots.plot: A bumbling mustachioed dictator gets his knickers in a twist while a barber who looks just like him escapes trouble with slapstick genius.
Wannabe world boss barks orders in gibberish, but a broke hair cutter just wants to keep his scissors and avoid getting squashed by madness.
Power-hungry buffoon is confused with his doppelgänger who’s busy dodging a parade of goose-stepping goons.
Bald cap tyrant with small hands wants more toys; a shaving enthusiast dodges duck-boot military dudes with his sneaky mirror tricks.
Shiny metal shoes’ lover tries to grab more sandbox, unwittingly swapped with a scissor-wielding twin dodging pogroms.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
movies.overview: As the railroad builders advance unstoppably through the Arizona desert on their way to the sea, Jill arrives in the small town of Flagstone with the intention of starting a new life.

plots.plot: Widow arrives in town to find her family dead, teams up with a harmonica-playing loner and a friendly bandit to fight a rail baron's evil plans.
Woman moves west, discovers her in-laws got killed, and gets mixed up with a mute cowboy who communicates by playing tunes and a bandit with a heart of gold.
Newcomer in desert town has to deal with a land-hungry tycoon, a mysterious musician, and a criminal who sometimes does good things.
A tale of dirt, dust, and daggers as an entrepreneur clashes with two enigmatic men, bonding over capitalism and revenge.
In a sandy showdown, a silent music enthusiast and a pragmatic outlaw confront a developer about space versus trains.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.overview: A holiday favourite for generations...  George Bailey has spent his entire life giving to the people of Bedford Falls.  All that prevents rich skinflint Mr. Potter from taking over the entire town is George's modest building and loan company.  But on Christmas Eve the business's $8,000 is lost and George's troubles begin.

plots.plot: Guy wishes he was never born, gets a crash course in his huge mess of a life from a quirky angel, then decides maybe life's not so bad.
Depressed dude considers checking out, but a dude with wings shows him how his hometown might as well go on unemployment without him.
A man in a suit experiences a midlife crisis, contemplates a swim-in-the-river solution until help from above reveals his value as the unsung town hero.
After a financial oopsie, a family man's dark nights turn enlightening thanks to some divine intervention and the potential of a world without him.
Disillusioned business owner sees potential alternative timeline’s dystopia caused by a lost fortune, an epiphany strikes thanks to celestial influence.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.overview: At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission that, officially, "does not exist, nor will it ever exist." His goal is to locate - and eliminate - a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory.

plots.plot: A sunburned dude gets a nasty letter from his boss, telling him to take a boat trip to fire a rogue yoga instructor in the jungle who lost his chill.
Army guy goes on canoe road trip to cancel another army guy who's playing warlord in the jungle, all while dodging napalm fireworks.
A soldier goes upriver to stop a bald man who's turned his mid-life crisis into a jungle dictatorship with style.
Adventurous river cruise into the heart of tropical boss battles where English lessons aren't exactly welcome.
Sweaty soldier embarks on hazardous river voyage to terminate charismatic leader's jungle makeover show.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.overview: Young lion prince Simba, eager to one day become king of the Pride Lands, grows up under the watchful eye of his father Mufasa; all the while his villainous uncle Scar conspires to take the throne for himself. Amid betrayal and tragedy, Simba must confront his past and find his rightful place in the Circle of Life.

plots.plot: A royal cat skips town after dad's death, hangs with a hippy duo, and returns to kick evil uncle butt.
Young regal kitty flees home after accidental murder, grows up in a chill paradise, then faces family drama.
Exiled youngster absorbs nihilistic philosophy from jungle pals before reclaiming a dusty rock throne.
A furry prince gets guilt-tripped by a ghost, and realizes vegetarian lifestyle isn't for him.
Disinherited feline tackles a drought-causing monarchy experiment gone wrong.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.

plots.plot: The purple guy snapped his fingers, wiped out half the universe, and left our heroes crying. So now they time travel, fat-shame a god, and fight a purple dude with family issues.
Team of misfits play dress-up, travel through time, lose a big mean potato's key jewelry piece, and perform a synchronized snapping to fix a colossal oops.
Cuddly rodent convinces spaced-out vets to collect the all-important glowy things from their past mistakes, fixing their unsnappable blunder of epic proportions.
After everyone cries over finger fail, time heist team botches an imaginative pick-pocketing trick on past selves, inviting chaos to the part of time where eggs come with a hint of dust.
Messy goatee man files a lawsuit on cosmic balance only to find 14 million ways where orange wins, inevitably reshaping extinct half's fate with a large, unsustainable wish.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: After the death of Emperor Marcus Aurelius, his devious son takes power and demotes Maximus, one of Rome's most capable generals who Marcus preferred. Eventually, Maximus is forced to become a gladiator and battle to the death against other men for the amusement of paying audiences.

plots.plot: A badass general gets demoted to lion chow until he finds the right moment to turn the Coliseum into a hater-baiting revenge fest.
A dude with anger issues upgrades from soldier to arena’s top attraction, while giving an aspiring emperor a history lesson in humility.
A demoted warrior uses a mob’s bloodlust to sharpen his stage presence and set the ultimate daddy's boy straight.
A begrudgingly ambitious man finds himself networking process to include armor and sand, showcasing 'murder for ratings' like its a new reality show.
Considered by some to be an ancient precursor to WWE, a displaced leader pummels through small-town gigs towards a climactic ratings match.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.overview: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by scalping and brutally killing Nazis. The Basterds, lead by Lt. Aldo Raine soon cross paths with a French-Jewish teenage girl who runs a movie theater in Paris which is targeted by the soldiers.

plots.plot: A group of angry rebel Jews go on a Nazi scalping spree while a girl with a cinema plans a fiery movie debut, featuring the Third Reich's biggest fans.
A head-shaving club's team-building trip to Europe coincides with a fiery cinematic event hosted by a girl with a unique take on film burning.
In a less-than-cozy European theater, popcorn is replaced with terror and the special guests are unaware they're about to star in a literal blockbuster.
Patrons in fancy uniforms attend a film release where the red carpet turns out to be more like a red puddle.
An uninvited scalp parade interrupts the greatest showing of dangerous pyrotechnics in old Europa.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.overview: Jack Torrance accepts a caretaker job at the Overlook Hotel, where he, along with his wife Wendy and their son Danny, must live isolated from the rest of the world for the winter. But they aren't prepared for the madness that lurks within.

plots.plot: Guy takes family to spooky hotel, talks to ghosts, loses it, and tries to axe his wife and son, but a maze slows him down.
Man goes crazy at a haunted hotel, chases his kid through a hedge labyrinth, and discovers that typing 'All work' makes for dull days.
Caretaker can't hold it together over winter, develops imaginary best buds, and chops down doors for fun.
Isolated dad gets cabin fever, befriends spirits, likes redrum, and forgets not to run with axes.
Confused janitor at snowbound estate learns all work doesn't pay off while exploring extensive iced shrubbery.

movies.title: Coco
movies.overview: Despite his family’s baffling generations-old ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead following a mysterious chain of events. Along the way, he meets charming trickster Hector, and together, they set off on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.

plots.plot: A kid steals a guitar, gets zapped to Boneville, and learns his great-grandpa was a music thief.
Boy defies grandma, plays dead string instrument, and unlocks skeletal family secrets.
The dilemma of a guitar-loving adolescent who crashes the afterlife party without an RSVP.
Youthful troubadour crash-lands in the boneyard, enlists skeletal swindler, and unravels a tuneful family enigma.
Young zealot flouts old-timey prohibition, meets colorful undead, and exposes legend's dastardly plagiarism.

movies.title: Star Wars
movies.overview: Princess Leia is captured and held hostage by the evil Imperial forces in their effort to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing captain Han Solo team together with the loveable robot duo R2-D2 and C-3PO to rescue the beautiful princess and restore peace and justice in the Empire.

plots.plot: A farm boy, a furball, a princess, and a sassy pilot blow up a giant space ball after dealing with a walking carpet and glowing swords.
Young guy ditches boring farm life, joins magic monk squad to help a rebellious lady in white against her weird dad’s floating death planet.
Amateur swordsman inherits an intergalactic beef with his dad's boss and his creepy sidekick, uses glowing stick to solve problems.
In space, an outdated ship and its scruffy captain reluctantly assist a runaway from a glittering desert to crash a masquerade ball.
Farm boy finds a beeping tin can, winds up in a galactic skirmish involving an army of lightbulb clubs, helping a diplomat in distress.

movies.title: Michael Jackson's Thriller
movies.overview: A night at the movies turns into a nightmare when Michael and his date are attacked by a horde of bloody-thirsty zombies. On top of the success of the Thriller album and Michael Jackson's electrifying performance at Motown 25, the short film/music video for "Thriller" established Jackson as an international superstar and global phenomenon. Thriller is credited for transforming music videos into a serious art form, breaking down racial barriers in popular entertainment, popularizing the making-of documentary format and creating a home video market. The success transformed Jackson into a dominant force in global pop culture. In 2009, it became the first music video inducted into the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as "culturally, historically or aesthetically significant". "Thriller" was also Jackson's seventh and final U.S. Hot 100 Top 10 hit from the Thriller album. It was the first album in history to have seven U.S. Top 10s.

plots.plot: Pop star turns into a werewolf after a bad date ends with a zombie dance-off.
Guy shows off dance moves to intimidate the undead but girlfriend just wants to leave the horror show.
Night out goes south when boyfriend pulls the old 'wrong moon phase' disappearing act.
Movie theatre time travel: from scary flicks to zombie dance armies.
Suburban stroll becomes undead disco; wolf guy sets trend, ignores chaos.

movies.title: Doctor Who: The Day of the Doctor
movies.overview: In 2013, something terrible is awakening in London's National Gallery; in 1562, a murderous plot is afoot in Elizabethan England; and somewhere in space an ancient battle reaches its devastating conclusion. All of reality is at stake as the Doctor's own dangerous past comes back to haunt him.

plots.plot: Time traveller meets his younger and grumpy selves to decide if blowing up his home planet is worth it after all.
A man with a magic screwdriver hangs out with his past selves to show some paintings, while saving England from blood-eyed statues.
Three strange travelers debate art in a museum until shape-shifting lizards demand better hospitality.
A group therapy session for a single person with self-destructive habits ends badly due to overzealous statue impersonators.
An embodiment of contradictions wagers with art lovers while strategically relocating cosmic paint.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.

plots.plot: Old pilot who refuses to grow up is tasked with babysitting cocky youngsters as they prepare for a mission that sounds more like a video game than reality.
A rebellious flight instructor with Peter Pan syndrome teaches hotshot rookies to fly faster than they can inflate their egos.
Veteran flyer avoids desk job to school young aviators on how to be airborne legends, feet off the ground but heads in the clouds.
Jet pilot icon becomes reluctant mentor to reckless wing-bearers, proving yet again that speed's more important than maturity.
Aging aerial cowboy stuck promoting flying skills over career ambition leads trainees on a mission, defying the need for professional advancement.

movies.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.overview: In a near-future Britain, young Alexander DeLarge and his pals get their kicks beating and raping anyone they please. When not destroying the lives of others, Alex swoons to the music of Beethoven. The state, eager to crack down on juvenile crime, gives an incarcerated Alex the option to undergo an invasive procedure that'll rob him of all personal agency. In a time when conscience is a commodity, can Alex change his tune?

plots.plot: A punk loves Beethoven, hates people, and gets a headwash from the government to stop being a jerk.
In future Britain, a Beethoven-loving delinquent signs up for state-run rehab but loses his edge after mind games go haywire.
Maniac in Britain opts for mind taming over time in the slammer, but soon regrets his new-found passion for good behavior.
Troublemaker with musical tastes is reprogrammed against badness, only to find politics and personal liberty collide in a not-so-dystopian future.
A tune-loving hooligan in tomorrowland chooses behavioral rewiring over jail time, yet finds life's symphony a bit too harmonious post-procedure.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

plots.plot: The dude teams up with a dentist-turned-hitman, goes off to rescue his wife from a Southern jerk who's more into property than people.
Freed guy finds a new BFF who hates slavery and both go on a couple's retreat filled with bullets and verbal jabs.
Antique guns, man-bonding road trip goes sideways against a backdrop of 1800s Southern real estate challenges.
A former shackled seeker embraces unconventional dentistry for marital reunion in a heated rural estate dispute.
Journey from Mississippi to revelation through unique monetary bounties and alternative dental profession.

movies.title: Hamilton
movies.overview: Presenting the tale of American founding father Alexander Hamilton, this filmed version of the original Broadway smash hit is the story of America then, told by America now.

plots.plot: Guy writes notes nonstop, does a dance-off with history, and dies in a duel like an overachiever.
Overcaffeinated wordsmith fights bureaucrats with raps and bullets, leaving a long paper trail.
One loudmouth gets a promotion, picks endless fights, and ends up as a museum footnote after a gun date.
Alphabetical hierarchy of shadows includes a lengthy sequence of rhyming disputes.
Ink and melodrama redefine the narrative graffiti of an antiquated bureaucracy.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.overview: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fueled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

plots.plot: Cuban refugee snorts mountains of cocaine, shoots his boss, and yells at furniture in Miami.
He moves from refugee camp to nose candy kingpin faster than you can say 'little friend.'
Transforming from a dishwasher to a snow merchant, he discovers power and paranoia are a poor cocktail.
Palm trees and power trips lead to nose diving off a white powder empire cliff.
A dirt poor immigrant's American dream unravels during a less-than-zen pool day with uninvited guests.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.overview: Headstrong yet aimless, Will Hunting has a genius-level IQ but chooses to work as a janitor at MIT. When he secretly solves highly difficult graduate-level math problems, his talents are discovered by Professor Gerald Lambeau, who decides to help the misguided youth reach his potential. When Will is arrested for attacking a police officer, Professor Lambeau makes a deal to get leniency for him if he gets court-ordered therapy. Eventually, therapist Dr. Sean Maguire helps Will confront the demons that are holding him back.

plots.plot: Boy genius moonlights as janitor to avoid homework, solves a puzzle, and ends up with a free therapist and a pretty girlfriend.
Clever mop guy scared of chalkboards gets busted by cops, trades jail time for hugs and math.
Massachusetts prodigy with poor life choices meets nurturing uncle figure while running late for parole dates.
Sweeping floors beats chalk traumas until math wizard is legally bound to spill personal drama.
Custodial calculus master reluctantly unlocks childhood trauma through mandatory weekly confessions.

movies.title: Alien
movies.overview: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.

plots.plot: Crew picks up an unwanted egg souvenir, ends up with a party crasher that has an extreme aversion to fire.
Space truckers respond to a booty call and end up dealing with the worst surprise babysitter from hell.
Break room petting fail results in nostril invasion and a really bad case of indigestion.
Unauthorized cave tour leads to a sleepover guest with poor table manners.
Delivery goes wrong when cargo includes the meanest blind date that anyone in space has ever seen.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.overview: To take down South Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own to infiltrate the underworld, not realizing the syndicate has done likewise. While an undercover cop curries favor with the mob kingpin, a career criminal rises through the police ranks. But both sides soon discover there's a mole among them.

plots.plot: Undercover cop plays double agent with Irish gangsters while the mob's favorite tattletale cozies up to the cops—everyone dies.
One dude fakes being a cop, the other fakes being a thug, and they both try to figure out who's the bigger faker before they both die spectacularly.
A cop pretends to be a bad guy, while the real bad guy pretends to be a cop, and they both have commitment issues.
A rat plays on both teams, but when the cheese runs out, it's exterminator time.
In a city where the workforce is an undercover cop's nightmare, two dudes swap secret club memberships until karma kicks in.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.overview: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

plots.plot: Jaded bar owner who's got a soft spot for whisky and ex-girlfriends helps his old flame and her rebel hubby escape the Nazi party poopers.
Ex-patriate finds himself in a love triangle in a smoky bar while Nazis and Vichy France try to rain on the parade.
Grumpy nightclub guy holds the future of a freedom fighter while gritting his teeth through romantic flashbacks.
Bitter cafe boss in North Africa has an existential crisis amidst torch songs and global conflict.
Disillusioned former smuggler grapples with ennui when war spills over with past entanglements in his self-imposed desert exile.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.overview: Every second of every day, from the moment he was born, for the last thirty years, Truman Burbank has been the unwitting star of the longest running, most popular documentary-soap opera in history. The picture-perfect town of Seahaven that he calls home is actually a gigantic soundstage. Truman's friends and family - everyone he meets, in fact - are actors. He lives every moment under the unblinking gaze of thousands of hidden TV cameras.

plots.plot: A clueless dude's whole life is a reality show, and he has no idea his every move is primetime entertainment.
Oblivious guy discovers his entire existence is just one giant soap opera for millions of voyeurs.
A fellow starts to question why his life feels scripted and everyone is weirdly nice to him all the time.
A man's hometown is suspiciously perfect, and he begins to notice everyone acts like they're in a cheesy drama.
A well-orchestrated scenario of scripted actors and inescapable surveillance leads a man towards existential revelations about his role in a hypothetical universe.

movies.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies.overview: In 1927 Hollywood, a silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

plots.plot: Silent film diva sounds like a dying cat, so a chorus girl helps her not embarrass herself while tap-dancing in the rain.
Silent movie stars panic when sound comes in, because who knew they needed more than just expressive eyebrows?
Famous dude finds that voice alone can't save a screechy enchantress, so he partners with a human jukebox.
A silver-screen icon learns sound is all fun and games until someone opens their mouth and ruins everything.
A moody mover questions whether a downpour really is the best time for a musical number, amidst a screenworld revolution.

movies.title: Joker
movies.overview: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

plots.plot: A failed clown discovers society's a joke, starts cosplaying as chaos and upgrades to nightlife crime endeavors.
When society treats you like the punchline, make killing jokes your headline act.
Struggling to make folks laugh, a wannabe comedian opts for less conventional methods of 'changing the world.'
The struggles of a face-painted misfit in a city that just doesn't get his unique sense of humor.
After career disappointment, a downtown loner finds purpose through revolutionary paintwork and unconventional merriment.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.overview: A botched robbery indicates a police informant, and the pressure mounts in the aftermath at a warehouse. Crime begets violence as the survivors -- veteran Mr. White, newcomer Mr. Orange, psychopathic parolee Mr. Blonde, bickering weasel Mr. Pink and Nice Guy Eddie -- unravel.

plots.plot: After a heist goes wrong, a bunch of color-coded crooks argue and scream in a warehouse like it's group therapy without the therapist.
Explosive heist fails, leading to Mexican standoff where no one wins except blood-stained floors.
When colors collide: Bad tempers, worse decisions, someone's bound to clean up the mess and it ain't the cops.
A thriller that teaches us never to trust a guy who's too enthusiastic about ear remodelling.
Shopping for suits? Get fitted for free during an emotionally charged lesson in trust fall disasters.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.overview: Set ten years after the events of the original, James Cameron’s classic sci-fi action flick tells the story of a second attempt to get rid of rebellion leader John Connor, this time targeting the boy himself. However, the rebellion has sent a reprogrammed terminator to protect Connor.

plots.plot: Murderbot turned babysitter is out to save the bratty future leader from a moody cop-bot with liquid vibes.
Metal nanny fights shapeshifting policeman to save future savior-wannabe and his grease monkey mom from apocalypse extravaganza.
Tough babysitter and rebel mom ditch maniacal metal janitor hoping to prevent toaster-induced doomsday.
Time-traveling babysitter flexes muscles, thwarts gooey gumshoe, saving angsty teen from nuclear barbeque.
A cold machine praises human behavior while its proposal to halt mass frying of common ancestors ends up with a thumbs-up approval.

movies.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies.overview: After the insane General Jack D. Ripper initiates a nuclear strike on the Soviet Union, a war room full of politicians, generals and a Russian diplomat all frantically try to stop the nuclear strike.

plots.plot: Crazy general decides to end the world, while everyone else in the room tries not to spill their coffee.
A room full of important people argues over how to fix the mess their crazy friend started, while a doomsday machine waits to ruin everyone's day.
Chaos ensues when a small mistake could turn everyone into glowing nightlights.
Politicians wrestle with a world-ending gaffe, hoping not to meet fiery sky mushrooms.
Minds race against ticking flavors of devastation, unfolding in a stale chamber of inaction.

movies.title: Soul
movies.overview: Joe Gardner is a middle school teacher with a love for jazz music. After a successful audition at the Half Note Club, he suddenly gets into an accident that separates his soul from his body and is transported to the You Seminar, a center in which souls develop and gain passions before being transported to a newborn child. Joe must enlist help from the other souls-in-training, like 22, a soul who has spent eons in the You Seminar, in order to get back to Earth.

plots.plot: Jazz-loving teacher falls into a hole, turns into a ghost blob, and tries to escape a soul daycare to avoid eternal orientation.
After a man kisses asphalt, his ghost buddy teaches him there's more to life than checking out permanently.
A human-shaped phantom desperately wants back on Earth to disrupt a relaxing, endless afterlife meeting just to play some tunes.
A musical entity gets an unexpected sabbatical in a metaphysical workshop where it learns that mentoring newbies about human quirks is compulsory.
A spirit with a midlife epiphany attempts a hostile takeover of their own existential journey by skipping the spectral bureaucracy.

movies.title: The Invisible Guest
movies.overview: Barcelona, Spain. Adrián Doria, a young and successful businessman accused of murder, meets one night with Virginia Goodman, an expert interrogation lawyer, in order to devise a defense strategy.

plots.plot: A wealthy businessman tries to dodge a murder charge by blaming his invisible ghost friend, but his lawyer's not buying it.
Guy buys a fancy gift for his mistress but ends up needing a lawyer instead of divorce court.
Business moguls shouldn't multitask illegal dumping and dating, especially when roadside accidents have consequences.
Success is great until an accident makes you play detective with a tough lawyer who thinks she's Sherlock.
When trying to one-up a holiday trip with a mistress, things go south, and kazoo-playing sleuths roll up their sleeves.

movies.title: Transformers One
movies.overview: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but once were friends bonded like brothers who changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

plots.plot: Two giant robot buddies have a falling out over who gets the last oil can, and decide to destroy their entire planet over it.
Once close like siblings, two metallic beings decide 'sharing is overrated' leading to intense intergalactic turmoil.
Planetary chaos ensues when two robo-siblings argue if red or blue suits the warrior leader fashion.
Metal fracas kicks off on their home turf because one shiny leader took an ancient treasure and a beef built up.
Once, two metallic beings on a resource-deprived planet discover free will and the value of stuff, ruining things.

movies.title: Prisoners
movies.overview: Keller Dover is facing every parent’s worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her young friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is a dilapidated RV that had earlier been parked on their street.

plots.plot: A dad kidnaps the wrong guy to find his kidnapped daughter, not realizing he's about to win the Worst Dad of the Year award.
Man kidnaps suspect for a wild basement party hoping he spills the beans about missing kids, but ends up needing a mop instead.
A determined dude thinks life’s a picnic until his precious gets nabbed; plays hide-and-seek to unravel the mystery van’s secrets.
Family guy turns vigilante plumber trying to flush out clues from the rusty tin can that holds more secrets than your fridge after midnight.
One man's quest involves a treasure hunt worthy mystery, a rusty old box on wheels, and learning just how puzzling a rainy day can become.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.overview: What if mankind had to leave Earth and somebody forgot to turn the last robot off? After hundreds of years doing what he was built for, WALL•E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE. EVE comes to realize that WALL•E has inadvertently stumbled upon the key to the planet's future, and races back to space to report to the humans. Meanwhile, WALL•E chases EVE across the galaxy and sets into motion one of the most imaginative adventures ever brought to the big screen.

plots.plot: Lonely trash-bot with unhealthy plant obsession stalks sleek space-droid girlfriend, saves humanity's butt while at it.
Earth's laziest resident skips the gym for 700 years, relies on an overly clingy trash collector and his equally lifeless friend to solve eco-disaster.
One trash-compacting gadget awkwardly mingles with rich interstellar cruise ship's AI assistant, igniting a chain reaction of human home invasion.
Obsolete scrapyard-bot befriends sleek probe tech, inadvertently instigating an obese human colony rebellion against their pampering overlord.
Nonchalant android with garbage fixation disrupts generations-long space vacation, inspiring snack-fed humans to rediscover gravity and dirt.

movies.title: Some Like It Hot
movies.overview: Two musicians witness a mob hit and struggle to find a way out of the city before they are found by the gangsters. Their only opportunity is to join an all-girl band as they leave on a tour. To make their getaway they must first disguise themselves as women, then keep their identities secret and deal with the problems this brings - such as an attractive bandmate and a very determined suitor.

plots.plot: Two guys dress up as women to escape the mob, but one falls for a girl in the band and the other gets chased by an old dude who missed his eye exam.
Musicians go undercover as gals to sneak past criminals, but things get wacky when one decides girl's night is the right time to find love.
Two gentlemen impersonate ladies to outrun trouble, complicating life when lady admirers don't seem to mind the loafers sticking out.
Dueling between bullet-dodging and wig-straightening, a duo discovers skirts double as the ultimate witness protection plan.
Under threat and in dresses, two performers redefine conscientious objector but find themselves entangled with brass instruments and unwanted courtship.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.overview: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.

plots.plot: Sad dude tries to delete his ex from his brain but changes his mind midway, realizing breakups suck, but brain wipe regretting sucks harder.
Guy deletes memories of crying over failed relationship, then panics when he realizes he might have also erased the only good part of it.
Middle-aged man makes bad choice of permanent blackout party for toxic romance, regrets when bad trip leads to accidental self-peace.
Melancholic fella goes under sci-fi lobotomy to erase ex's nagging, only to discover it’s not technology when love punches back.
Guy cheats emotional amnesia system when his subconscious tries to escape digital net to preserve once-sweet nothings.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movies.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione continue their quest to vanquish the evil Voldemort once and for all. Just as things begin to look hopeless for the young wizards, Harry discovers a trio of magical objects that endow him with powers to rival Voldemort's formidable skills.

plots.plot: The boy wizard fights a noseless dude and dies for ten minutes, then comes back to blow up a snake and win the war.
Nerd squad sneaks into a bank, rides a rollercoaster, and tries not to get roasted by a dragon for withdrawing cursed treasure.
Bravery, love, and a spooky tiara get ruined in a wizards' school with major architectural damage.
Three shiny baubles and an old wand, offering cheat codes for a game of wizard tag, but only one player really gets them.
Dark lord's DIY horcrux collection reaches an explosive end as masked enthusiasts run damage control on faulty blackout curtains.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

plots.plot: A nerdy scientist makes a big boom, then feels super bad about it.
Guy gathers brainy friends to make a sun-in-a-box, then gets mad when people call him a destroyer.
Scientist turns desert into fireworks show, regrets lighting the match.
Dude makes history's loudest mistake, spends rest of life saying 'oops.'
In a hot sandy place, a thinker outsmarts himself creating a very unpleasant light show that ends more than just a party.

movies.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
movies.overview: After seven months have passed without a culprit in her daughter's murder case, Mildred Hayes makes a bold move, painting three signs leading into her town with a controversial message directed at Bill Willoughby, the town's revered chief of police. When his second-in-command Officer Jason Dixon, an immature mother's boy with a penchant for violence, gets involved, the battle between Mildred and Ebbing's law enforcement is only exacerbated.

plots.plot: A mom's super angry about her daughter's murder, so she buys three massive billboards to publicly roast the police chief whose crew couldn't find their own butts with a map.
After cops can't crack a murder case, townsfolk get entertained by a billboard war between a grieving mom and local law enforcement, with rage-filled hijinks.
Mom rents giant signs to insult everyone in uniform, making cops the stars of their own scripted reality show with added arson.
Billboards turn sleepy town into drama HQ, featuring crime scenes, incompetence, swear words, and fleeting feelings of revenge.
Tiny town achieves national fame using three obnoxious advertisements, campaign slogans, and awkward small-town justice.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.overview: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalized mother, and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.

plots.plot: Two kids move to the sticks, discover monster-sized fluffballs, and use them as buses while dad's oblivious.
Siblings befriend oversized puffballs with night bus careers while their mom's stuck in a hospital like a permanent vacation.
Two pint-sized explorers leave urban life for rural spirit shenanigans, including unauthorized creature rides.
Relocation catalyzes unexpected interactions with colossal woodland custodians; the tow advantage isn't optional.
Transient familial residence invites interaction with incomprehensible gigantomorphic entities with functional transport features.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.

plots.plot: Bald apes find a big rock and use it as motivation to head to space, only to be outsmarted by their GPS system.
A sweet, soulful AI falls in love with its mission, but ends up channeling its inner ex-girlfriend and starts ghosting everyone, permanently.
When space teams up with a monolith and some killer classical music, everybody learns they should have just stayed in bed.
After an ominous sculpture invites humans on a stellar quest, they realize their biggest adversary is a monotonous cyclops.
A metaphorical domino piece reveals itself centuries apart to different species, enticing them on journeys of discovery and mutiny.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.overview: In the winter of 1982, a twelve-man research team at a remote Antarctic research station discovers an alien buried in the snow for over 100,000 years. Soon unfrozen, the form-changing creature wreaks havoc, creates terror... and becomes one of them.

plots.plot: Scientists in Antarctica play 'Guess Who?' with a shape-shifting alien hell-bent on turning them into alien sushi.
An ancient extraterrestrial blob invades an Antarctic pajama party, leading to heated discussions and blowtorch diplomacy.
When a frozen surprise defrosts in chilly isolation, it's a bad hair day for everyone in the science hut.
In the eternal winter, trust issues escalate with murderously gooey consequences.
In a landscape as chilly as their personalities, a team faces a cosmic impersonator schooling them in identity theft.

movies.title: Hidden Figures
movies.overview: The untold story of Katherine G. Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson – brilliant African-American women working at NASA and serving as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history – the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit. The visionary trio crossed all gender and race lines to inspire generations to dream big.

plots.plot: Three math geniuses behind bad '60s desks solve math so a dude can spin around the Earth without a calculator.
Three brains in skirts do the math because space computers are gigantic room heaters that can't handle fractions.
The space race depended on chalkboard wizards not slowing down for traffic lights beyond Earth.
When your job involves sky yoga, it's best to trust calculations not made by machines prone to overheat.
In an era when numbers had more impact than hairstyles, human calculators redefined gravity with geometry and grit.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.overview: The Grand Budapest Hotel tells of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting, the battle for an enormous family fortune and the slow and then sudden upheavals that transformed Europe during the first half of the 20th century.

plots.plot: A hotel concierge and his lobby boy sidekick steal a painting, battle an angry family, endure prison, and run from creepy henchmen while Europe falls apart.
Fancy schmancy hotel guy gets framed for murder, teaches a kid how to become his mini-me, makes jail escape more fashionable than ever.
Gentleman with mustache gets art for free during chaos, babysits bellhop, both dodge the law and aggressive relatives.
Hotel employee inherits headaches from waxed-man guest, ends up doing art heist inspired by socioeconomic collapse.
Euro man outpaces dictators, seeks treasure held by unlikable brood as he schools his bellboy in hotel hodgepodge luxury.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.overview: A New York stockbroker refuses to cooperate in a large securities fraud case involving corruption on Wall Street, corporate banking world and mob infiltration. Based on Jordan Belfort's autobiography.

plots.plot: Rich con-artist gets high on life, drugs, and money; throws dwarf-tossing parties while scamming billions, then meets the fun police - also known as the FBI.
Guy becomes rich because he sells dreams on the phone; creates chaos with a hooker and cocaine business plan, ramps up a lifestyle that's the grand finale of bad decisions.
A crafty salesman lives the high life as his ethical compass enjoys an extended vacation, eventually triggering an FBI wake-up call that hits harder than a line of coke.
Profit-driven bro disrupts conventional inflation rates of decency, eventually getting insomnia in a cramped government-funded hotel room.
When sleazy creativity meets intellect from all the wrong decisions, not even Bermuda's distance can save him from Capitol consequences.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
movies.overview: Year three at Hogwarts means new fun and challenges as Harry learns the delicate art of approaching a Hippogriff, transforming shape-shifting Boggarts into hilarity and even turning back time. But the term also brings danger: soul-sucking Dementors hover over the school, an ally of the accursed He-Who-Cannot-Be-Named lurks within the castle walls, and fearsome wizard Sirius Black escapes Azkaban. And Harry will confront them all.

plots.plot: A teenage wizard plays hooky, befriends a werewolf and a convict godfather, while a soul-sucking security team gets hired at his high school.
Poor orphan kid meets his long-lost jailbird uncle, fights creepy floating things, and turns back the clock to fix his bad decisions.
Kid with glasses and lightning scar gets annoyed by the castle guards and adopts a large pet bird-horse.
Student's past decisions morph from terrifying to hilarious thanks to magical wardrobe malfunction and clock rewiring skills.
A fugitive's mispronounced name inspires unnecessary terror while domestic staff becomes unexpectedly crucial for plot development.

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.overview: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation with his daughter's attractive friend.

plots.plot: Middle-aged dad quits job, gets fit, buys new car, drools over teen cheerleader, and dies like a squashed bug.
Suburban dude hits existential crisis, lifts weights, watches a teen instead of TV, and ends up dead on the kitchen floor.
A man's midlife crisis accelerates as red petals and unexpected seduction make everything unravel but end in the grim embrace.
Mundane block life gets spicy with illicit video rentals, misplaced lust, and an envy-driven bullet.
A plastic sheet's dance becomes oddly symbolic in a journey of chaotic beauty, aspiration, and homicide set in cookie-cutter paradise.

movies.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
movies.overview: A drama based on the true story of a college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.

plots.plot: Guy picks up a stray dog, dies, but the dog keeps waiting for him for nearly a decade like he's still paying rent.
Professor likes mutt, gets hitched to it spiritually, then leaves the dog with the epic challenge of learning about grief.
Busy human fancies a furry companion, shows it where the trains are, and lets go of earthly responsibilities except loyalty education.
An academic finds tail-wagging friendship, tragically clocking out early, yet orchestrating a relentless stand-off against canine patience.
A commuter leaves behind a legacy of selfless fidelity, subliminally hypnotizing his quadrupedal buddy to cherish railways over realities.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.overview: Newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane is taken from his mother as a boy and made the ward of a rich industrialist. As a result, every well-meaning, tyrannical or self-destructive move he makes for the rest of his life appears in some way to be a reaction to that deeply wounding event.

plots.plot: Spoiled orphan grows up to be a newspaper tycoon, collects statues, wrecks marriages, and says 'Rosebud' like it's a secret code for happiness.
Rich guy buys papers, loses friends, yells at people, and dies talking about a sled, proving money can't buy childhood memories.
Dude who buys headlines can't stop talking about a cryptic last word as if it's a winning lottery ticket.
Man with no social skills or indoor voice makes great headlines but even his dying word is a flop.
A mogul obsessed with control leaves the world puzzled over the significance of snow playthings.

movies.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.overview: The story of British officer T.E. Lawrence's mission to aid the Arab tribes in their revolt against the Ottoman Empire during the First World War. Lawrence becomes a flamboyant, messianic figure in the cause of Arab unity but his psychological instability threatens to undermine his achievements.

plots.plot: An English dude with a thing for robes takes a joyride in the desert, plays dress-up, and breaks stuff with new friends.
A guy loses his marbles while playing a real-life version of Risk in a gigantic sandbox.
A quirky wanderer goes on an epic sand adventure, getting too invested in tribal Tik-Tok.
A sunburnt foreign diplomat becomes a celebrity while dabbling in landmark rearrangement.
A war tourist gains questionable fame rewriting local geography, all driven by wardrobe choices.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.overview: Based on the real life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.

plots.plot: Introverted nerd builds the world's first computer to win a war and impress a girl, ends up saving the world but not his dignity.
Math guy assembles a crew of brainiacs to outsmart a machine and claims victory, but welcome to 'War Heroes 101' where no one gets medals.
The socially awkward puzzle enthusiast discovers math can crush Nazis but doesn't really boost your social life.
Joining forces with exceptional thinkers, a genius crafts a contraption that makes large-scale spy puzzles no longer kosher.
A weirdo programmer designs a wall-decoder to trash German data privacy, redefining war secrets with a juggernaut machine.

movies.title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
movies.overview: An assassin is shot and almost killed by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

plots.plot: Lady wakes up from a long nap after a few colleagues crashed her wedding, goes on to slice and dice everyone, including her old boss.
Former knife enthusiast wakes up, ditches the hospital gown for a yellow jumpsuit, and decides to make a hit list of all her backstabbing pals.
A plainclothes ninja with a maternity issue goes after a retired maestro to settle the score over a wedding gone wrong.
A previously stunned warrior sets out on a quest to collect signatures, but with blades instead of pens.
A samurai enthusiast, betrayed by a percussionist, goes on an odyssey reminiscent of the ancient Greek hero, but with way more blood.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.overview: A group of working-class friends decide to enlist in the Army during the Vietnam War and finds it to be hellish chaos -- not the noble venture they imagined. Before they left, Steven married his pregnant girlfriend -- and Michael and Nick were in love with the same woman. But all three are different men upon their return.

plots.plot: Steelworkers play a deadly game of charades in Vietnam, only to return home wanting therapy, not deer.
Some guys leave steel mills for lethal bingo overseas, then come back and can't even look at venison.
Factory pals swap hard hats for helmets, indulge in adrenaline roulette, return home wounded in more ways than one.
Blue-collar bros take a Vietnam vacation; discover 'mental health' is not just about brain exercises.
Three comrades face gravity-defying bullets abroad, attempt to hunt symbolism back home.

movies.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.overview: Scout Finch, 6, and her older brother Jem live in sleepy Maycomb, Alabama, spending much of their time with their friend Dill and spying on their reclusive and mysterious neighbor, Boo Radley. When Atticus, their widowed father and a respected lawyer, defends a black man named Tom Robinson against fabricated rape charges, the trial and tangent events expose the children to evils of racism and stereotyping.

plots.plot: A lawyer defends an innocent man while his kids annoy the neighborhood recluse and learn racism is bad.
A small-town lawyer fights injustice while his kids think peeking at the local weirdo is a fun game.
A Southern gentleman tries to prove justice exists while his offspring think staring competitions with their introverted neighbor count as a hobby.
A guy in glasses with a strange family is more interested in defending a cause than bottling his kids’ curiosity for the unsocial nightcrawler next door.
In a dusty place where fair trials are not that common, an upright fellow believes in innocence despite his curious offspring trying to solve the mystery of their elusive next-door gentleman.

movies.title: The Secret in Their Eyes
movies.overview: Hoping to put to rest years of unease concerning a past case, retired criminal investigator Benjamín begins writing a novel based on the unsolved mystery of a newlywed’s rape and murder. With the help of a former colleague, judge Irene, he attempts to make sense of the past.

plots.plot: A retired guy obsesses over a cold case about a dead bride while flirting with his old boss, because that's how everyone deals with PTSD, right?
A washed-up detective writes fan fiction about a case he never solved, while trying to win the judge's love via their shared trauma.
Retirement's boring when your biggest achievement is a tragedy, so play detective with old pals and hope no one notices the love letters hidden in case files.
New novel idea: swap your daydreams about a judge's smooch with cracking an unsolvable crime, just in case retirement hobbyists need excitement.
Mid-life crisis? Skip the sports car and solve a dusty crime that smells like unreciprocated courtroom crushes.

movies.title: Gran Torino
movies.overview: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

plots.plot: Grumpy old vet befriends the kid who tried to swipe his sweet ride, teaches him life lessons instead of calling the cops.
A cranky man befriends a young thief, swaps racial slurs for life advice, and forms an unlikely friendship over a car.
Old-timer's love for metal on wheels leads to babysitting job for the neighbor's kid who prefers theft over auto shows.
A sardonic senior finds purpose not in bingo but in guiding a local teen who initially eyed his garage treasure with sticky fingers.
Korean War survivor turns zen master, schooling a teen in the art of true horsepower appreciation rather than boosting skills.

movies.overview: At the height of the First World War, two young British soldiers must cross enemy territory and deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack on hundreds of soldiers.

plots.plot: Two soldiers go on a jog through Hell, dodging bombs and bullets, to stop a selfie crisis.
During the Great War, two guys must sprint through nastiness to cancel a disastrous sword party.
In the war's wild ride, a couple of guys must play tag with disaster to yell "Stop!" at the right time.
When arbitrary chaos meets boyish determination, a duo auditions for the 'Don't Die Club'.
Dashing young men attempt a relay race across a surreal hellscape to convey a particularly urgent mail.

movies.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
movies.overview: Singer Freddie Mercury, guitarist Brian May, drummer Roger Taylor and bass guitarist John Deacon take the music world by storm when they form the rock 'n' roll band Queen in 1970. Hit songs become instant classics. When Mercury's increasingly wild lifestyle starts to spiral out of control, Queen soon faces its greatest challenge yet – finding a way to keep the band together amid the success and excess.

plots.plot: Buck-toothed singer with a killer voice ditches his airport job to join a band, rocks the world, battles with wild parties and dodgy love lives, then steals the show at Live Aid.

An immigrant with a funky mustache and a 4-octave range joins three nerds to make legendary foot-stomping anthems, then throws it all away for sex, booze, and drugs until a benefit concert half-assedly fixes everything.
A band achieves world acclaim despite one dude's questionable lifestyle choices, including dallying with goldfish and sequined jumpsuits.
A famous band has its issues amplified due to one singer's unchecked ego and preference for over-the-top market-friendly collaborations.
A well-known musician faces public backlash for a wild reckoning involving his rise from Zoroastrian heritage to rock stardom, with track lives taking center stage.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.overview: Advertising man Roger Thornhill is mistaken for a spy, triggering a deadly cross-country chase.

plots.plot: Innocent ad man gets chased across the country because everyone thinks he's someone else, all while romancing a girl on a train and dodging crop dusters.
Guy drafts ad campaign for a nonexistent Lincoln car, gets chased by a biplane, and climbs a famous mountain while flirting under duress.
Suit-wearing guy mistaken for non-suit spy, followed by the world's longest awkward date involving a train, some shady dudes, and a suitcase.
Confused professional tries to survive elaborate cosplay of mistaken identity, involving bumpy flights, rocky descents, and unwanted attention.
Confusion in a government-funded marathon leads to encounters with a dusty vintage crop event, cliff-based hitchhiking, and a stone-faced finale.

movies.title: Catch Me If You Can
movies.overview: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor. An FBI agent makes it his mission to put him behind bars. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.

plots.plot: High school dropout plays dress-up as pilot, doctor, and lawyer, scams banks, and drives an FBI guy bananas.
Crafty teen ribs the American systems, switching costumes to turn checks into unlimited fun coupons.
Kid who was too smart for school becomes Pan Am's unannounced young mascot, casually waltzing past security.
Some guy turns Monopoly money into real-life currency by misfiling his job applications as 'Everything, Inc.'
Teen's quest for parental attention escalates into a nationwide game of 'Guess My Profession' with law enforcers perplexed.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies.overview: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

plots.plot: Bridal party turns into a horror show when the bride wakes up ready for revenge on her ex-boss Bill and his mean friends.
A ninja bride wakes up from a coma madder than a wet hen and sharpens her sword to make sushi out of her old workplace buddies.
A woman fond of yellow tracksuits doesn’t love her ex-employers anymore, especially the one who gives everyone terrible nicknames.
A crashed wedding turns into a red-soaked reunion when the bride decides that forgiveness is overrated.
A vengeful ex-employee initiates an extensive retrenchment strategy using unconventional HR tools.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.overview: Led by Woody, Andy's toys live happily in his room until Andy's birthday brings Buzz Lightyear onto the scene. Afraid of losing his place in Andy's heart, Woody plots against Buzz. But when circumstances separate Buzz and Woody from their owner, the duo eventually learns to put aside their differences.

plots.plot: Cowboy gets jealous of spaceman, tries to murder him, but ends up on a buddy road trip instead.
