A plastic spaceman forgets his roles are only pretend, causing inconvenience to a cowboy suffering from jealousy.
A walky-talky in denial causes an existential crisis leading to conflict in a child's toy collection.
The sheriff presides over an intergalactic misunderstanding resulting in comedic mortal peril at a home of pyrotech-loving neighbor.
Mini egos collide leading to unexpected unity for survival when misplaced in a child's chaos realm.

movies.title: Up
movies.overview: Carl Fredricksen spent his entire life dreaming of exploring the globe and experiencing life to its fullest. But at age 78, life seems to have passed him by, until a twist of fate (and a persistent 8-year old Wilderness Explorer named Russell) gives him a new lease on life.

plots.plot: Old guy ties balloons to his house to escape a retirement home but accidentally kidnaps a chubby kid.
Senior citizen evades eviction by soaring away via helium-powered residence, inadvertently collecting a pint-sized sidekick.
Grumpy pensioner attempts spontaneous house aviation and adopts an accidental flying partner.
Elderly gentleman skydives his domicile to unexpected destinations with an uninvited, enthusiastic stowaway in tow.
A septuagenarian aeronaut befuddles civil aviation by piloting his balloon-propelled homestead to a jungle destination, accompanied by an underage assistant.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

plots.plot: Teenage arachnid enthusiast gets outed, asks a wizard to fix things, breaks the universe, and hosts a multiverse villain party.
Web-slinger accidentally invites sinister guests to a city-wide reunion bash while trying to erase his celeb status with magic.
In a twist of magical misfire, a hero and his caped friend accidentally start a reality show starring angry interdimensional drop-ins.
Young acrobat and mature yogi botch a spell, causing unwanted dimensional visitors, each with questionable intentions.
A student with arachnid powers scrambles to rectify his exposed identity while interdimensional shenanigans unfold, thanks to one found in a Greenwich landmark.

movies.title: Aliens
movies.overview: Ripley, the sole survivor of the Nostromo's deadly encounter with the monstrous Alien, returns to Earth after drifting through space in hypersleep for 57 years. Although her story is initially met with skepticism, she agrees to accompany a team of Colonial Marines back to LV-426.

plots.plot: Woman wakes up after a long nap to find out a nasty space bug is causing trouble again, so she teams up with a bunch of macho soldiers who bring the wrong guns to a monster fight.
A lady reluctantly spends her vacation on a creepy moon babysitting macho army dudes who think bullets solve everything, including big ugly aliens.
Mandatory carry for anyone going to bug-infested holiday spots involves hip new flamethrower fashion, and the hype lasts till big teeth show up.
When beefcakes with beer muscles meet slobbering bugs, expect working moms to save the day while marines scream like teenagers in a horror flick.
A relocation specialist discovers therapy pets have sharp tails and bad breath while dealing with management’s hazardous real estate blunders.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.

plots.plot: An eccentric billionaire decides playing God is a good idea, hires a team of expert babysitters for his dino-petting zoo, but shockingly forgets to lock the cage.
Bored rich dude gives birth to dino Disneyland, invites some eggheads and whiny brats to see it, but the electrics go out, and the 'attractions' want revenge.
Science goes on Jurassic safari, tickets punched by a sneaky employee with conscience issues, leaving the attraction critters to run amok while guests still manage to find awe in 'life finds a way.'
Ever thought about mixing frogs and chicken DNA? Try that with T-Rex and watch as chaos theory obliterates rich dreams, while kids barely survive an 8-ton sneeze machine.
DNA resurrection efforts result in mega fauna face-off after ethical software hacking leads to a park where even plant-eaters have agendas and velociraptors host impromptu hide-and-seek sessions.

movies.title: The Iron Giant
movies.overview: In the small town of Rockwell, Maine in October 1957, a giant metal machine befriends a nine-year-old boy and ultimately finds its humanity by unselfishly saving people from their own fears and prejudices.

plots.plot: Kid finds huge robot in forest, teaches it not to blast everything, robot saves town from army, cries while flying.
Metal muncher falls from sky, bonds with chatty kid, accidentally terrifies Cold War America.
Brobdingnagian automaton learns not to shoot first, thanks to pint-sized human's moral guidance.
Alien engineering error adopts curious problem-solver, confronts paranoid primal threats.
Industrial colossus faces existential crisis amidst McCarthy-era mass hysteria, opts for noble self-sacrifice.

movies.title: The Great Escape
movies.overview: The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Based on a true story.

plots.plot: Bored soldiers in Nazi prison dig tunnels to escape, forgetting they're not moles.
Captured guys play dirt games, hate walls, and slide through tubes only to rediscover Germany is big.
Uniformed dwellers of a barbed-wire village channel mole instincts for a grand Houdini act.
Unsuccessful resort in 1940s Europe where guests have creative ideas for dodging checkout.
Masterful wormhole simulation fails as enthusiastic role-playing enthusiasts misjudge terrain hospitality.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.overview: Enraged at the slaughter of Murron, his new bride and childhood love, Scottish warrior William Wallace slays a platoon of the local English lord's soldiers. This leads the village to revolt and, eventually, the entire country to rise up against English rule.

plots.plot: Guy wears a kilt, paints his face blue, and yells at the English like they ran over his dog.
Face-painted kilt enthusiast loses wife, declares he’s way too Scottish to follow rules.
Loincloth-clad dude gets really angry when his significant other doesn't get a pulse check.
Man with facial paint leads a group of friends to engage in professional disagreement with another country.
Gypsy skirt fan becomes a national legend by regrettably not inventing the pocket watch before his untimely demise.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.overview: In the smog-choked dystopian Los Angeles of 2019, blade runner Rick Deckard is called out of retirement to terminate a quartet of replicants who have escaped to Earth seeking their creator for a way to extend their short life spans.

plots.plot: A grumpy cop in a rainy city chases robots but falls for one, proving he's good at his job but bad at romance.
In the future, a dude plays hide and seek with folks who aren't really people but definitely have commitment issues.
Retired detective returns for a gig that's part mercy killing, part existential crisis, all while it never stops raining.
A film noir setting needs someone to evict unlicensed androids that forgot their shutdown date.
A man gripes about the rain while tracking down biologically enhanced AWOL units in a neon-infused urban jungle.

movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.overview: The spoiled daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a tumultuous romance with a cynical profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction Era.

plots.plot: Spoiled Southern belle throws tantrums, survives war, juggles men, and ultimately pines for a dude who walks out with the iconic line about not caring.
A rich brat discovers the hard way that flirtation is not a sustainable life strategy during civil unrest, especially when you can't stop thinking the wrong guy is dreamy.
During a big ol' historical kerfuffle, 'pretty dresses' lady learns being annoying won't stop a house fire or win you an entrepreneurial husband.
In times when change is as unpopular as broccoli-flavored ice cream, an heiress with a knack for drama keeps hustling through bad vibes, complicated love, and cotton dilemmas.
Georgia's most eligible debutante discovers that plantation parties and pragmatic cavaliers do not mix well during societal upheaval and personal aspirations for curtain couture.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.overview: In the pre-Civil War United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery. Facing cruelty as well as unexpected kindnesses Solomon struggles not only to stay alive, but to retain his dignity. In the twelfth year of his unforgettable odyssey, Solomon’s chance meeting with a Canadian abolitionist will forever alter his life.

plots.plot: Dude thinks he's going on a music gig, ends up in the world's worst job with no pay, and it takes him over a decade to quit.
Guy from the North goes South, gets forced into extreme manual labor, and waits for basically the only decent Canadian to come rescue him.
A musician's road trip turns into a really long working holiday, totally not the kind anyone wants.
This northern fellow learns geography the hard way; from liberty to 'no vacation days.'
An involuntary labor exchange program lacking the 'exchange,' spanning over a decade, orchestrated by enterprising wrongdoers.

movies.title: Raging Bull
movies.overview: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

plots.plot: Boxer dives headfirst into self-destruction, expertly ignoring 'Don't Punch Your Wife' rule.
Hot-headed guy's fists love the ring but hate his marriage, resulting in a championship belt and an empty bed.
An Italian stallion pummels foes and relationships with equal passion, balancing fame with serious rage issues.
A meathead can't decide whether to beat up opponents or his personal relationships, so he chooses both.
A gloved gladiator's penchant for packing punches permeates his career and personal bonds, turning victory into isolation.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.overview: When Dr. Indiana Jones – the tweed-suited professor who just happens to be a celebrated archaeologist – is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.

plots.plot: An archaeologist gets roped into a government gig to stop art collectors with questionable taste from opening a fancy box that melts faces.
A guy with a whip and a hat races evil fashionistas to find a stash that comes with a killer light show.
An academic swaps lecture halls for jungle gyms in pursuit of a gilded container set to redefine skincare routines.
An obsessive collector battles suit-clad antagonists over an ancient art piece that turns admirers into puddles.
A dubious team-building retreat pits explorers against uniformed enthusiasts to secure a mythic receptacle with severe occupational hazards.

movies.title: Heat
movies.overview: Obsessive master thief Neil McCauley leads a top-notch crew on various daring heists throughout Los Angeles while determined detective Vincent Hanna pursues him without rest. Each man recognizes and respects the ability and the dedication of the other even though they are aware their cat-and-mouse game may end in violence.

plots.plot: A cop and a crook have a bromance over a cup of coffee while occasionally trying to shoot each other in Los Angeles.
A fancy burglar loves robbing banks, and a cop who's way too serious about his job is hell-bent on ruining the burglar's dreams of early retirement.
A bald-headed crew leader and an exasperated detective play hide-and-seek using banks and armored trucks as their playground.
Career outlaw practices 'take your daughter to work day' by juggling heists and shootouts, while an insomniac lawman shows up just a little too late.
A perfectionist's paradise where one man destroys relationships by stealing cash, and another does so by chasing those who steal, both finding unity in chaos.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.overview: When 11-year-old Riley moves to a new city, her Emotions team up to help her through the transition. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness work together, but when Joy and Sadness get lost, they must journey through unfamiliar places to get back home.

plots.plot: A bunch of feelings in a girl's head mess up, and while Joy and Sadness take a vacation, Anger accidentally sets emotional firework shows.
Inside a kid's brain, cheerful and mopey emotions go on an unexpected road trip while anger, nausea, and anxiety awkwardly manage the controls.
The colorful crew of brain citizens face an emotional bureaucratic crisis after two members irresponsibly leave for sightseeing.
In a chaotic office space, two high-strung workers' absence causes unexpected emotional decisions controlled by their underqualified peers.
A disarray occurs in a headspace syndicate leading to a misadventure of bright and dull employees traveling a psyche-folding maze.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: 101-year-old Rose DeWitt Bukater tells the story of her life aboard the Titanic, 84 years later. A young Rose boards the ship with her mother and fiancé. Meanwhile, Jack Dawson and Fabrizio De Rossi win third-class tickets aboard the ship. Rose tells the whole story from Titanic's departure through to its death—on its first and last voyage—on April 15, 1912.

plots.plot: Fancy girl dumps rich guy for a broke bro, draws her like a sketchbook, then she monopolizes a door and lets him ice over.
Big boat can't dodge a chilly iceberg thanks to spotters texting too much.
Artistic drifter gets lucky in card game, ends up drawing nude portraits and taking cold baths.
Dramatic class struggle played out on a luxury cruise with terrible swimming lessons.
A floating, chilly disaster doubles as a steamy vehicle for dated love stories peculiar enough to sink the unsinkable.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.overview: Light years from Earth, 26 years after being abducted, Peter Quill finds himself the prime target of a manhunt after discovering an orb wanted by Ronan the Accuser.

plots.plot: Space cowboy with a mixtape teams up with a green assassin, a muscled wrestler, a raccoon with anger issues, and a walking tree to save the universe from a blue meanie.
Jukebox thief accidentally gets wrapped up with a space family of misfits to keep a glowy ball out of the hands of an uptight genocidal supremacist.
Guy with cool dance moves and charm ends up leading a dysfunctional team to stop a zealot from using a celestial marble as a weapon.
A klepto teams up with a disgraced warrior, a genetic experiment, a botanical bouncer, and a convict on parole to prevent cosmic-scale destruction.
Galactic mixologist turned orphan conceals valuable artifact to prevent an eco-villain's plans for indiscriminate planetary blender action.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.overview: To save her father from certain death in the army, a young woman secretly enlists in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

plots.plot: A girl in ancient China pretends to be a guy, joins the army, kicks butt, and makes a dragon cry.
She swaps her dad's walking stick for a sword, but ends up friends with a cricket and a lizard.
In a battle of wigs and war, someone's disguise leads to fireworks in unexpected places.
Pigtails and pigtails meet infinite discipline, with socks optional for hitchhiking home.
The culinary power of soundless spirits, transformative for both diet and demon.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
movies.overview: Harry Potter has lived under the stairs at his aunt and uncle's house his whole life. But on his 11th birthday, he learns he's a powerful wizard—with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. As he learns to harness his newfound powers with the help of the school's kindly headmaster, Harry uncovers the truth about his parents' deaths—and about the villain who's to blame.

plots.plot: Boy learns he's a wizard, goes to magic school, makes friends with a redhead and a nerd, and fights a bald noseless dude who really hates babies.
Orphan thinks he can talk to snakes, starts a new life where he rides a flying broom and fights a teacher with a growth spurt on his neck.
Kiddo gets a scar from a botched assassination attempt, attends a quirky school, and learns that mirrors aren't just for admiring yourself.
A chosen one misplaces a family heirloom while dealing with an existential threat wrapped up like a mummy behind his professor.
An adoptee discovers his lineage and fends off a clumsy thief obsessed with cosmetics while developing his broom riding skills.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.overview: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.

plots.plot: Wannabe actress and jazz lover fall in love while dancing badly across LA, only to break up due to career ambitions and a pointless jazz solo.
Barista dreams of Hollywood and jazz dude dreams of saving dead music genre; they dance, date, and eventually decide they like their careers more than each other.
A coffee-slinging dreamer and a trombone enthusiast twirl through city traffic and dream sequences before realizing real life is more like a sad jazz ballad.
An underpaid caffeine pusher and a musical historian make noises and decisions under streetlights before discovering ambition is a third wheel.
Lattes and melodies mix in a climactic quagmire where creative desperation and neon cityscapes push artistry above cuddles.

movies.title: Return of the Jedi
movies.overview: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, while the Emperor seeks to destroy the Rebellion once and for all with a second dreaded Death Star.

plots.plot: Space farm boy with daddy issues turns mechanical teddy bears into freedom fighters, and together they outsmart an evil retirement home resident who loves black capes.
Leather bikini enthusiast gets strangled by giant slimy gangster office chair while her crowd of weird lizard guys drop space hero into giant mouth of death.
Young monk-in-training gets new green glow stick, visits dad problems, but can't resist playing catch with grenades.
Helmet-breathing dude realizes family disputes on metal moon lead to electrifying moments, though office chair master has his own shocking agenda.
Ewok community dismantles imperialistic strategies using primitive tools and surprising tactical advantage, while zen apprentice resists paternal manipulation in overworld critical confrontation.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.overview: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.

plots.plot: Guy Fawkes cosplayer in a mask blows up stuff in London, while mentoring a woman in punk haircuts and pyrotechnics.
Mask-wearing dude with a flair for drama defies bald bad guys by setting off fireworks and having long conversations with a nearly-shaved sidekick.
A masked man turns his vendetta into an explosive governmental critique, overseen by a dramatic wannabe comic book heroine.
An eccentric anarchist host with a penchant for knife-throwing and bad poetry attempts to liberate his drab dystopia.
A caped crusader with speech impediments and theatrical vendettas spurs revolution with clockwork precision and fiery gestures.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

plots.plot: Broke dad drags his son around trying to sell futuristic doorstops while training for a job that doesn't pay.
Guy with a bone-breaking machine goes from sleeping in bathrooms to being the best unpaid intern.
A wannabe stock wizard crashes investment conferences with portable medical devices and a small fan club.
Man parks his dreams at daycare while vending bone-rattling gadgets and gambling ambitions in a cubicle jungle.
A guy hustles the American dream by selling fancy skeleton-refreshers on the sidewalk, hoping they'll someday turn into a metal briefcase.

movies.title: Coraline
movies.overview: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, 11-year-old Coraline discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life. In order to stay in the fantasy, she must make a frighteningly real sacrifice.

plots.plot: Girl with terrible parents finds a door to a better world where dolls try to sew buttons over her eyes.
Curious kid gets bribed with fake love and sugar, but escapes before getting a button-eye makeover.
Young explorer finds the ultimate 'too good to be true' home upgrade, complete with nightmare-eyed inhabitants.
Adventurous lass discovers hidden passage promising perfection, only for the alternate reality to have strings attached—literally.
Brilliant kid uncovers a domestic parallel universe which operates with ocular-extreme tailoring incentives.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.overview: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

plots.plot: Dude's wife vanishes, media flips out, he's the prime suspect but twist: she set him up because marriage is a thriller genre.
Guy thinks his wife is missing but she's just playing a sick game of hide-and-seek with forensic evidence.
Media carnival follows a guy who suddenly finds himself single, thanks to his wife's elaborate vanishing act.
A guy's picture-perfect life gets blown up by his partner's sneak attack; headlines and hashtags follow.
In a shocking game of blame and fame, one half of the well-coiffed couple executes a disappearing act that dazzles the public.

movies.title: The Greatest Showman
movies.overview: The story of American showman P.T. Barnum, founder of the circus that became the famous traveling Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus.

plots.plot: Charismatic hustler starts a human zoo, makes money by exploiting misfits, and still manages to come off as a hero.
Guy convinces a bunch of 'unique' individuals to join his legally questionable parade, somehow calls it entertainment.
A hat-wearing enthusiast reinvents his career after realizing people enjoy staring at things they find unusual.
A washed-up entrepreneur discovers that charging people to gawk at societal outcasts is more lucrative than selling imaginary bonds.
An ambitious visionary turns his talent for stretching truth into public spectacles with unexpected song and dance numbers.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
movies.overview: The Bride unwaveringly continues on her roaring rampage of revenge against the band of assassins who had tried to kill her and her unborn child. She visits each of her former associates one-by-one, checking off the victims on her Death List Five until there's nothing left to do … but kill Bill.

plots.plot: Former assassin bride kicks butt to get revenge on her ex-boss baby daddy, using a special finger trick to save on bullets.
Ex-assassin mom uses kung fu and a sneaky snake to cross names off her revenge list, then chills at a house with goldfish.
Pregnant lady drops a 5-finger discount on one-eyed enemies before shelling out Tea Pei lessons for betrayal debts.
A notorious scalp-hunter goes to the desert, gets buried alive, but manages to wiggle out just in time for a deadly tea party.
After emerging from her cactus nap, a woman confronts a flute player, takes a stroll down memory lane, and encounters a trunk full of betrayal.

movies.title: Little Women
movies.overview: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.

plots.plot: Four sisters dream of a sweet life, teaching rich dudes not to ignore wild hearts, while Auntie yells, and one guy dies for plot spice.
Set in a post-war America, a quartet of ambitious short individuals navigate societal roles and a surprise visit from the Grim Reaper.
Sewing and writing lead to wild adventures, minus internet; love offers cameo appearances alongside a symphony of lace and sarcasm.
In a land of petticoats and earnest hopes, a domestic squad swaps dreams for dough while dodging societal landmines.
Ageing and affections intertwine as creative spirits clash with pragmatic sensibilities in an era of obsolete connections.

movies.title: Ben-Hur
movies.overview: In 25 AD, Judah Ben-Hur, a Jew in ancient Judea, opposes the occupying Roman empire.  Falsely accused by a Roman childhood friend-turned-overlord of trying to kill the Roman governor, he is put into slavery and his mother and sister are taken away as prisoners.

plots.plot: Jewish guy gets into a beef with his old Roman buddy, ends up in slavery, becomes a big-shot chariot racer, and outdoes everyone in the coolest race of the time.
Guy's bestie goes from pal to nemesis, making him drag a boat around before he hits it big riding fancy horse carts.
A dude uses his evil former friend as motivation to become the ancient world's first NASCAR champion.
A case of heavy accusations, nautical fitness training, and high-stakes horse games get a fellow out for bitter revenge.
A gifted driver faces old betrayal, navigates politics, and gets some thoroughbred horsepower to capitalize on entertainment.

movies.title: Young Frankenstein
movies.overview: A young neurosurgeon inherits the castle of his grandfather, the famous Dr. Victor von Frankenstein. In the castle he finds a funny hunchback, a pretty lab assistant and the elderly housekeeper. Young Frankenstein believes that the work of his grandfather was delusional, but when he discovers the book where the mad doctor described his reanimation experiment, he suddenly changes his mind.

plots.plot: The grandson of a mad scientist teams up with a hunchback and a hot assistant to create a campy monster that's less scary Frankenstein and more like Frankensparkle.
A dude discovers granddaddy's monster-making secrets, creates life from spare parts, and accidentally gets the bolts out of his mind instead.
Reluctant mad scientist plus old castle equals goofball giant and a lack of understanding of brain shopping.
Disgruntled with his legacy, a man ends up sparking life, but forgets to read 'Monster-Handling 101.'
Challenging normalcy, a man reconstructs history's dull delight through electrifying bonding skills, punctuated with opera.

movies.title: Just Mercy
movies.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.

plots.plot: A smarty-pants lawyer goes to the South to save an innocent guy from the electric chair, basically playing superhero lawyer in a real-life injustice comic.
Harvard dude lands in Alabama, fights bad guys with papers and words instead of laser beams.
A legal rookie runs headlong into the Deep South's favorite sport: judicial hoop-jumping.
In an epic courtroom malfunction, a justice-seeking dude toggles between being a legal whiz and a fly in the judicial ointment.
Atticus Finch wannabe finds himself swimming upstream in a river of bias and paperwork without a paddle.

movies.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
movies.overview: After the death of a United States Senator, idealistic Jefferson Smith is appointed as his replacement in Washington. Soon, the naive and earnest new senator has to battle political corruption.

plots.plot: Clueless newbie senator tries to clean up the pigsty of politics but ends up filibustering like a pro while his enemies plot his downfall.
Rookie in DC gets a crash course in backstabbing when he naively tries to play by the rules.
A greenhorn attempts to dam ambition with a river of honesty in a crowded room of sharks.
A wide-eyed believer in democracy gets tied up in procedural red tape instead of landing the knockout punch he planned.
The heir of American ideals takes a surprise detour into loophole labyrinths designed by power-hungry oafs who collectively redefine bureaucracy.

movies.title: Fargo
movies.overview: Jerry, a small-town Minnesota car salesman is bursting at the seams with debt... but he's got a plan. He's going to hire two thugs to kidnap his wife in a scheme to collect a hefty ransom from his wealthy father-in-law. It's going to be a snap and nobody's going to get hurt... until people start dying. Enter Police Chief Marge, a coffee-drinking, parka-wearing - and extremely pregnant - investigator who'll stop at nothing to get her man. And if you think her small-time investigative skills will give the crooks a run for their ransom... you betcha!

plots.plot: A nice guy hires two dingbat criminals to nab his wife for ransom cash, but spills more beans than blood; meanwhile, a waddling pregnant cop chomps through his messy trail like a bowl of chili-dipped donut holes.
Wannabe criminal mastermind sinks his family into chaos faster than you can say 'ya sure, you betcha' by trusting a pair of two-bit hoodlums to solve his cash crisis.
Minnesota nice turns not-so-nice when a slippery salesman cooks up a scheme, but ends up with more snow blowers than brains on his hands.
A northwoods riddle involving a broken-down boss, buzzard-brained henchmen, and a mother-to-be with a knack for solving puzzles boggles a chain of snow-laden cataclysms.
Blundering through a tundra of financial ruin, a bamboozled businessman watches as an unlikely duck-stomping hero wobbles her way to untangling a frigid mess.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.overview: Brilliant mathematician, John Nash, is on the brink of international acclaim when he becomes entangled in a mysterious conspiracy.

plots.plot: Super smart numbers guy hallucinates secret agents, makes life miserable for him and everyone else until reality finally kicks in.
Genius math dude has imaginary friends who keep telling him he's in a spy movie, but it's actually just a horror show in his mind.
Brilliant math whiz's brain hits the glitch button, causing him to mix chalkboard equations with non-stop hallucination station.
A math ace cracks under pressure, seeing pretend people as he battles phantom cloak-and-dagger antics that don’t exist.
Gifted thinker swirls into chaos with paranoid projection of complex corporate conjuring.

movies.title: Stand by Me
movies.overview: After learning that a boy their age has been accidentally killed near their rural homes, four Oregon boys decide to go see the body. On the way, Gordie,  Vern, Chris and Teddy encounter a mean junk man and a marsh full of leeches, as they also learn more about one another and their very different home lives. Just a lark at first, the boys' adventure evolves into a defining event in their lives.

plots.plot: Four kids go corpse hunting and bond over daddy issues, train dodging, and leech phobia — the summer camp you never wanted.
Oregon boys take a field trip to see 'Boy Rot' and play chicken with a freight train, learning more life lessons than in school.
A pre-pubescent version of 'CSI' unfolds as a quartet seeks a fallen comrade and have existential crises over dead meat.
Dusty streets, petty crimes, and a parenting failure hotline converge when tweens become trailblazers for a corpse discovery.
Four adventurous rural stumblebums find unexpected therapy through decaying human flesh while evading future grocery store cashiers.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.overview: In 1938, an art collector appeals to eminent archaeologist Dr. Indiana Jones to embark on a search for the Holy Grail. Indy learns that a medieval historian has vanished while searching for it, and the missing man is his own father, Dr. Henry Jones Sr.. He sets out to rescue his father by following clues in the old man's notebook, which his father had mailed to him before he went missing. Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, Dr. Elsa Schneider, along with Marcus Brody and Sallah. Together they must stop the Nazis from recovering the power of eternal life and taking over the world!

plots.plot: Whip-wielding archaeologist teams up with dad to stop germ-loving maniacs from getting a fancy cup.
Guy with a hat and his germaphobe dad race a group of historical reenactors trying to sip from a bad chalice.
A scholar's son steals a book club's scrambled treasure map, then plays escape room with old European landmarks.
History buff and a nerd head to the sandy side to outwit mustache enthusiasts in pursuit of infinite refills.
Two leather-loving gents explore stony cathedrals to prevent an eagle-loving cult from chugging mythical elixir.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

plots.plot: Old millionaire plays Cluedo with family, forgets he’s the murder victim.
Rich corpse hosts family reunion, but guests forgot to RSVP.
Wealthy elder's posthumous surprise leaves family in a Monopoly-level mess.
In a real-life version of 'Who's in the Will?', trust fund babies face a killer puzzle.
While ego-nosed sleuth channels techno beats, an inheritance house party hits rock bottom on parental GPS.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.overview: Lovable Sulley and his wisecracking sidekick Mike Wazowski are the top scare team at Monsters, Inc., the scream-processing factory in Monstropolis. When a little girl named Boo wanders into their world, it's the monsters who are scared silly, and it's up to Sulley and Mike to keep her out of sight and get her back home.

plots.plot: Furry blue giant and his one-eyed buddy scream for a living, accidentally babysit a toddler that thinks they're stuffed animals.
Monsters scare kids for batteries but one kid scares the monsters into becoming comedians instead.
Workplace drama unfolds when a power plant's top employee and his short assistant cause chaos by accidentally letting a dangerous product roam free.
A nervous corporate drone and his overly confident gym-bro co-worker must hide an 'illegal energy source' during a factory inspection.
Two blue-collar workers disrupt the volatile energy industry by inadvertently engaging in a high-stakes game of hide-and-seek with a 'prohibited item'.

movies.title: Dances with Wolves
movies.overview: Wounded Civil War soldier John Dunbar tries to commit suicide—and becomes a hero instead. As a reward, he's assigned to his dream post, a remote junction on the Western frontier, and soon makes unlikely friends with the local Sioux tribe.

plots.plot: A Civil War soldier tries to off himself but accidentally becomes a hero, then moves to hang with Native Americans and question his life choices.
Soldier dude thinks he has a death wish, ends up hanging out with a bunch of Sioux instead and thinks maybe life's not so bad.
Guy who failed at dying turns his life upside down by befriending folks in a village far, far away.
A confused soldier explores the great outdoors and finds new pals and a life lesson or two.
Unsatisfied man embarks on a journey to nowhere and finds unexpected company by the fire.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.overview: Jeffrey 'The Dude' Lebowski, a Los Angeles slacker who only wants to bowl and drink White Russians, is mistaken for another Jeffrey Lebowski, a wheelchair-bound millionaire, and finds himself dragged into a strange series of events involving nihilists, adult film producers, ferrets, errant toes, and large sums of money.

plots.plot: Slacker gets mistaken for a millionaire, loses a rug that really tied the room together, and bowls his way through a kidnapping, a toe incident, and nihilists.
Bowling enthusiast's life spirals out of control after a soaked rug leads to chaos, chaos and more chaos, plus White Russians.
Uninterested loner becomes a crime magnet when thugs think he's rich and destroy his favorite floor accessory.
Lazy bowler's chill life is ruined by a peed-on rug, forcing him into a world of kidnappers, bizarre performance art, and absurd demands for toes.

When foreign-policy nihilists and aggressive Larry's dad disrupt home decor, a relaxing man and his buddies find themselves embroiled in bizarre and humorous predicaments featuring beverages with cream and vodka.

movies.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.overview: Tired of scaring humans every October 31 with the same old bag of tricks, Jack Skellington, the spindly king of Halloween Town, kidnaps Santa Claus and plans to deliver shrunken heads and other ghoulish gifts to children on Christmas morning. But as Christmas approaches, Jack's rag-doll girlfriend, Sally, tries to foil his misguided plans.

plots.plot: A skeleton-wannabe-Santa kidnaps the real Santa to offer cursed toys to children, because who needs Christmas joy, right?
In a graveyard town, bone-man steals holiday and stuffs stockings with horror while ignoring his melting girlfriend's advice.
The scariest holiday guy tries to nail a cheerful tradition but ends up turning children's dreams into screamlands.
Perpetual Halloween enthusiast ruins another festive occasion by confusing terror with tree ornaments.
A fellow from Scareville abducts a jolly fellow in red to share his misinterpretation of festive joy, focusing on shrieks and gore over gifts and greenery.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.overview: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father.

plots.plot: Viking teen skips dragon slaying for dragon taming, all to impress a girl and annoy his dad.
Awkward teenager befriends winged reptile instead of killing it, creating chaos and potential dad grounding.
Young man with identity issues questions tradition, takes in a misunderstood flying lizard as a pet.
Rebellious youngster's new scaley friend gets him in trouble with the locals, who prefer roast dragon.
Fledgling hero finds flying pest insurance, discovers they're furrier and less flamey than advertised.

movies.title: The Grapes of Wrath
movies.overview: Tom Joad returns to his home after a jail sentence to find his family kicked out of their farm due to foreclosure. He catches up with them on his Uncle’s farm, and joins them the next day as they head for California and a new life... Hopefully.

plots.plot: Ex-con gets out of jail, finds family evicted, and they all cram into a jalopy to hunt for nonexistent California jobs.
Guy leaves his cell, finds out his folks are homeless, and embarks on a road trip with dreams and a ton of dust.
A dude fresh out of the clink finds his family's life is more of a disaster than his rap sheet; hilarity ensues on their road to nowhere.
A band of desperate dreamers flee their barren wasteland, convinced sunshine and oranges will solve their great depression.
A dust-covered clan swaps their tumbleweeds for Grapevine passes, chasing mirages of prosperity in the land of milk and honey.

movies.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
movies.overview: When his family moves from their home in Berlin to a strange new house in Poland, young Bruno befriends Shmuel, a boy who lives on the other side of the fence where everyone seems to be wearing striped pajamas. Unaware of Shmuel's fate as a Jewish prisoner or the role his own Nazi father plays in his imprisonment, Bruno embarks on a dangerous journey inside the camp's walls.

plots.plot: A kid visits his new backyard and makes a friend through a deadly fence, because just playing tag is too mainstream during WWII.
Curious child tries out his new striped pajamas and realizes there's no pool or buffet on the other side.
Aspiring explorer gets lost in a human zoo, plays the worst hide-and-seek game ever.
Naive mini-tourist crosses borders without a passport, finds vacation spot lacking a good travel brochure.
A naive young inspector explores behind enemy lines, only to discover a 'pajama party' of cosmic irony.

movies.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
movies.overview: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

plots.plot: Teen witch struggles with puberty and flying skills while delivering parcels on a broomstick.
Teenage broom-user starts a delivery business but struggles with GPS and jealous pigeons.
Eco-friendly transportation pioneer embraces work-life stress in a coastal metropolis.
New girl in town tries to blend in while mastering unconventional transportation methods.
Suburban air courier start-up faces logistical challenges and existential flight concerns.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.overview: Remy, a resident of Paris, appreciates good food and has quite a sophisticated palate. He would love to become a chef so he can create and enjoy culinary masterpieces to his heart's delight. The only problem is, Remy is a rat. When he winds up in the sewer beneath one of Paris' finest restaurants, the rodent gourmet finds himself ideally placed to realize his dream.

plots.plot: A rat with a taste for fine dining turns a clumsy human into his puppet chef, cooking up a storm in a snobby French restaurant.
Tiny furball takes control of a clueless human to create fancy meals, exposing the restaurant's hygiene disaster.
Rodent from the gutter learns the ropes of haute cuisine by using a human meat puppet to cut onions.
Four-legged critter schemes its way into a kitchen, guiding an daft janitor to culinary stardom in a top eatery.
Sewer-dweller with gourmet ambitions exploits a clumsy sap to orchestrate kitchen chaos in pursuit of Michelin stars.

movies.title: Rosemary's Baby
movies.overview: A young couple, Rosemary and Guy, moves into an infamous New York apartment building, known by frightening legends and mysterious events, with the purpose of starting a family.

plots.plot: A couple moves into a creepy apartment, husband joins a demon fans' club, and bam, she's pregnant with Satan Jr.!
After making some new occult buddies in her spooky building, a woman's prenatal vitamins come with a side of satanic headaches.
When expecting a bundle of joy, beware of nosy neighbors wielding devilish deals and strange smoothies.
Hoping for a peaceful life, a couple nose-dives into an urban inferno where baby shower gifts include paranoia and pentagrams.
In a twisted real estate venture, an ambitious actor bets on sinister senior friendships resulting in a fiery legacy.

movies.title: Logan
movies.overview: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X in a hideout on the Mexican border. But Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

plots.plot: Old claw guy is forced into another round of superheroes babysitting when a little girl with an attitude and daddy issues joins the clubhouse. Meanwhile, grandpa's brain doesn't work right and a guy with a robot hand won't leave them alone.
A grumpy old limo driver with retractable cutlery reluctantly shepherds his long-lost mini-me to a mutant summer camp, while avoiding mall cops who have seen too many Terminator movies.
Gramps and Claw Man hide in Taco Land until a kid with foot blades drags them on a cross-country road trip, like 'Little Miss Sunshine,' but with more impaling.

In a world lacking people with freakish abilities, a man driven by drink and melancholy participates in a high-stakes game of hide-and-seek with an android army, reluctantly protecting a feral adolescent.
A cab driver with a bad manicure navigates paternal instincts, dementia, and a dystopian chase orchestrated by tech-enthusiasts with a penchant for genetic correction.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.overview: Nemo, an adventurous young clownfish, is unexpectedly taken from his Great Barrier Reef home to a dentist's office aquarium. It's up to his worrisome father Marlin and a friendly but forgetful fish Dory to bring Nemo home -- meeting vegetarian sharks, surfer dude turtles, hypnotic jellyfish, hungry seagulls, and more along the way.

plots.plot: Helicopter dad loses his fish son to a kidnapper dentist, teams up with a blue amnesiac to chase sharks, dodge turtles, and body-slam seagulls to get him back.
An overly cautious fish dad goes on a wild goose chase across the sea with an airheaded friend to save his kidnapped son from a tooth doctor.
Paranoid parent pursues a small fry taken by a dental practitioner; meanwhile, memories are deeply overrated.
Obsessive single dad enlists a reckless sidekick's help to retrieve his spawn from captivity, avoiding massive fish-eaters and surface-dwelling feather-brains.
Neurotic parental figure navigates against oceanic predators and captures, entrusting a careless ally suffering from acute short-term memory loss.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.overview: After Port Royal is attacked and pillaged by a mysterious pirate crew, capturing the governor's daughter Elizabeth Swann in the process, William Turner asks free-willing pirate Jack Sparrow to help him locate the crew's ship—The Black Pearl—so that he can rescue the woman he loves.

plots.plot: Sassy pirate with wonky compass teams up with a blacksmith to save a damsel from cursed skeleton sailors who really need a blood transfusion.
A flashy pirate and a guy with a hammer boat-hop to save a necklace-thieving lady from bony dudes who hate sunlight.
Magnet for bad decisions escorts a metal-bender on a boat ride to retrieve jewelry from nocturnal scallywags.
Guy with a clearly unfinished dental plan recruits a metal artisan in a grand mission against sun-averse sailors missing vital liquids.
The one whose moral compass is as broken as his magnetic one joins forces with someone who hammers metals into fun shapes to face human sunblock enthusiasts on a floating antique.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
movies.overview: When Harry Potter's name emerges from the Goblet of Fire, he becomes a competitor in a grueling battle for glory among three wizarding schools—the Triwizard Tournament. But since Harry never submitted his name for the Tournament, who did? Now Harry must confront a deadly dragon, fierce water demons and an enchanted maze only to find himself in the cruel grasp of He Who Must Not Be Named.

plots.plot: Clumsy teen accidentally ends up in a killer wizard tournament, fights a dragon, swims with mermaids, and gets lost in a hedge maze with serious anger issues, while some creepy baldie makes a comeback.
Boy's name pops out of a magical cup like a bad surprise party, making him play deadly games he never signed up for, all while a bald noseless dude plots in the background.
A kid gets tricked into an intense triathlon of magic, including fire-breathing reptiles and water aerobics, only to nearly become toast on the toastiest toast rack.
Uninvited wizard participates in an extracurricular activity that's more extreme than any gym class, where swimming and gardening are as deadly as they sound.

An involuntary participant ends up in a competition that's less about trophies and more about survival, involving fire-breathing, aquatic acrobatics, and hedge-based navigation skills, all while avoiding a rebranding pale antagonist.

movies.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.overview: King Arthur, accompanied by his squire, recruits his Knights of the Round Table, including Sir Bedevere the Wise, Sir Lancelot the Brave, Sir Robin the Not-Quite-So-Brave-As-Sir-Lancelot and Sir Galahad the Pure. On the way, Arthur battles the Black Knight who, despite having had all his limbs chopped off, insists he can still fight. They reach Camelot, but Arthur decides not  to enter, as "it is a silly place".

plots.plot: King, on the hunt for a fancy cup, can't walk, chats with coconuts instead of his horse, and dances through nonsense land with very silly knights.
Imaginary monarch and his clanking troop joust invisible foes, and then go full Monty in an era where everything is brain-piercingly absurd.
Comically mustachioed fools wander, avoiding civilization and encountering poorly-armed territorial nihilism with baffling persistence.
Silent steeds, existential duels, and a recognition that serious places are imminently avoidable lead to ultimate interruptions.
Mute hoof displays, multiple-resistant combatant, questers distracted by absurd theater, until anticlimactic intervention occurs.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.overview: Woody, Buzz, and the rest of Andy's toys haven't been played with in years. With Andy about to go to college, the gang find themselves accidentally left at a nefarious day care center. The toys must band together to escape and return home to Andy.

plots.plot: A cowboy and spaceman break out of toy prison to stop being used like chew toys by a horde of sticky toddlers.
Plastic pals escape from toddler hell to reunite with their emotionally constipated owner off to college.
Abandoned playthings stage a daring jailbreak from fashionably cheap childcare.
Sentient knick-knacks revolt against a plush monarch in a padded dystopia overrun by kid chaos.
Neglected miniatures mutiny against a pink kingpin in a crayon-smeared asylum.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.overview: NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her offices Christmas Party, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.

plots.plot: Barefoot cop crashes Christmas party uninvited and ends up being the worst guest ever by shooting up the place to stop some party-crashing European robbers.
Guy in a building uses broken glass as a loofah while playing hide and seek with armed robbers dressed like bargain Bond villains.
Office worker hosts party, but uninvited rooftop fireworks enthusiast in white vest steals the show with his impromptu fireworks display.
California skyscraper hosts improv performance where audience participation results in several explosions and unfortunate demolitions.
Tank-top loving man ruins international entrepreneurs' innovative demolition test disguised as a festive office experiment.

movies.title: Porco Rosso
movies.overview: In Italy in the 1930s, sky pirates in biplanes terrorize wealthy cruise ships as they sail the Adriatic Sea. The only pilot brave enough to stop the scourge is the mysterious Porco Rosso, a former World War I flying ace who was somehow turned into a pig during the war. As he prepares to battle the pirate crew's American ace, Porco Rosso enlists the help of spunky girl mechanic Fio Piccolo and his longtime friend Madame Gina.

plots.plot: A pig-nosed pilot fights sky pirates in Italy while crushing hard on a nightclub singer.
An Italian pig man with aerodynamics rivals American poser while dealing with plucky girl sidekick.
Snout-wearing aviator enjoys bacon-free breakfasts and punches visual holes in the sky to smite aerial pirates.
In fashion-forward wings over water, oinking man evades airborne riff-raff nipping at chubby tail fenders.
Rendered more ham than man, a bill-paying porcine aviator faces airborne scavengers beside sprightly gearwizard.

movies.title: L.A. Confidential
movies.overview: Three detectives in the corrupt and brutal L.A. police force of the 1950s use differing methods to uncover a conspiracy behind the shotgun slayings of the patrons at an all-night diner.

plots.plot: Three cops in 1950s L.A. break knees, lie, and uncover a diner massacre plot while trying not to punch each other.
In a city where hair gel is currency, three cops aim for fame but stumble into a bloody breakfast scene.
A shady snack joint becomes detective boot camp when silver badges clash over violent nocturnal cravings.
Experts in paperwork and demolition explore gourmet options in a morally flexible precinct.
Mid-century law enforcers integrate investigatory reporting with questionable gastric choices in a city of angels.

movies.title: Scent of a Woman
movies.overview: Charlie Simms is a student at a private preparatory school who comes from a poor family. To earn the money for his flight home to Gresham, Oregon for Christmas, Charlie takes a job over Thanksgiving looking after retired U.S. Army officer Lieutenant Colonel Frank Slade, a cantankerous middle-aged man who lives with his niece and her family.

plots.plot: Blind ex-soldier ropes in prep school kid for a wild weekend of hookers, Ferraris, and terrible tango dancing.
Grumpy blind guy takes a young man hostage on a sightseeing spree before teaching him life lessons through reckless driving.
Cranky vet drags insolvent student on a weekend trip leading to inappropriate dancing and vehicle hijinks.
A retired officer with optical challenges schools a financially-challenged teen on the art of chaos and ladies.
A visually impaired man provides ethics training via dangerous driving escapades and unconventional social gatherings.

movies.title: Brokeback Mountain
movies.overview: In 1960s Wyoming, two men develop a strong emotional and sexual relationship that endures as a lifelong connection complicating their lives as they get married and start families of their own.

plots.plot: Two cowboys exchange sheep herding for some mountain man cuddles, while their wives wonder why they need so many camping trips.
Wyoming becomes ground zero for a duo of ranch wranglers who discover that working with sheep isn't the wildest thing they can do together.
In the '60s, a pair of married guys discover that what happens on the range definitely does not stay on the range.
Four-legged work turns into two-legged romance and leads to more than just geographical mountains to climb.
Two outdoorsy fellows find themselves entangled in a decades-long relationship as twisted as the trails they travel.

movies.title: Rocky
movies.overview: An uneducated collector for a Philadelphia loan shark is given a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to fight against the world heavyweight boxing champion.

plots.plot: Underdog boxer fights champ, gets punched, bleeds a lot, but hey, love conquers bruises.
Meathead brawler goes from breaking legs to breaking noses by punching his way into America’s heart.
Southpaw slacker needs cash, beats meat, punches beef, then hugs it out in a ring.
Guy who’s great with knuckles but bad with names bets on brawn over brains with a famous fist-fest.
Punch-man chooses pounding beef and spotlight over daily microfinance enforcement duties.

movies.title: Dune
movies.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.

plots.plot: Allergic aristocrat on sand planet gets high on space drugs, befriends giant worms, and starts a holy war.
Space prince plays spice survivor on a desert planet, while his royal family gets sandbagged.
Noble son, the 'chosen one', flees to the sandy wilderness to shake things up with dune hippies.
Baronial takeover goes sour when young heir hooks up with desert rebels and starts preaching.
Spicy desert rave gets disrupted when worm-whispering teen drops by with mom for some culture shock.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.overview: Following the death of District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman assumes responsibility for Dent's crimes to protect the late attorney's reputation and is subsequently hunted by the Gotham City Police Department. Eight years later, Batman encounters the mysterious Selina Kyle and the villainous Bane, a new terrorist leader who overwhelms Gotham's finest. The Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

plots.plot: Batman fights a muscle-bound guy with a mask and a really bad voice while less interestingly still has to justify saving the identity of a guy whose biggest crime was being forgettable.
A billionaire with a penchant for cosplay gets his first back massage from a dude who definitely skipped leg day, leading to him having a revitalizing underground escape experience.
Rich, caped lad believes in, literally, rising to the occasion while dodging socially awkward tube sandwiches and power outages in hopes of rekindling an old love affair with a kleptomaniac.

An overconfident man-child grapples with identity theft issues while a respiratory device enthusiast bulldozes his personal development, all amidst the booming real estate of improvised football stadiums.

Zillionaire with a penchant for theatrics gets schooled in cave climbing as he attempts to stop the fan club of a monotonous gas huffer believing in property market manipulation in a fortified circus tent themed district.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.overview: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save what's important to her by connecting with the lives she could have led in other universes.

plots.plot: Overworked laundromat owner goes on a psychedelic trip through parallel universes, uses kung fu and butt plugs to stop a giant everything bagel from destroying reality.
Woman hates her taxes, accidentally becomes a multiverse-hopping superhero who battles a sartorial villain with hot dog fingers.
Middle-aged lady discovers new hobbies like bagel baking, martial arts, and fighting nihilistic pastry enthusiasts across endless realities.
Grumpy laundromat worker uncovers new uses for everyday objects, realizes existential threats come in many unexpected forms.
Disgruntled spouse travels through options, finds meaning battling a universe-ending snack item created by an emotional doyenne.

movies.title: Back to the Future Part II
movies.overview: Marty and Doc are at it again in this wacky sequel to the 1985 blockbuster as the time-traveling duo head to 2015 to nip some McFly family woes in the bud. But things go awry thanks to bully Biff Tannen and a pesky sports almanac. In a last-ditch attempt to set things straight, Marty finds himself bound for 1955 and face to face with his teenage parents -- again.

plots.plot: A teenager and his eccentric scientist buddy zoom to the future, screw it up with a greedy sports book, then have to fix the past when a bully wrecks everything.
A kid visits the future with science grandpa, steals a book, messes up the timeline, and has to return to his parents' era to clean up the mess.
Teens on hoverboards, a dystopian alternate timeline, and the discovery that gambling can really screw up reality.
Losing bets and reality-warping time travel create a world where a scrappy kid has to babysit his younger, oblivious mom and dad.
Timeline shenanigans land a young dude in a backward world, where life's a chaotic soap opera that starts with chicken courage and ends with a stolen DeLorean.

movies.title: Life of Brian
movies.overview: Brian Cohen is an average young Jewish man, but through a series of ridiculous events, he gains a reputation as the Messiah. When he's not dodging his followers or being scolded by his shrill mother, the hapless Brian has to contend with the pompous Pontius Pilate and acronym-obsessed members of a separatist movement. Rife with Monty Python's signature absurdity, the tale finds Brian's life paralleling Biblical lore, albeit with many more laughs.

plots.plot: Mistaken for a prophet, a guy gets stuck in hilarious messes with his nagging mom and a stuttering Roman governor.
A mistaken identity problem leads an unlucky man to dodge crazy followers and bickering rebels.
In ancient times, a regular bloke finds divinity is more of a burden than a blessing, especially with Roman officials lisping orders.
Being born next door to a real celebrity causes chaos as misunderstandings with rebellious factions and imperial forces spiral out of control.
The throes of mistaken idolatry involve a local lad lost among worship and ideological absurdity under dusty Roman skies.

movies.title: The Untouchables
movies.overview: Elliot Ness, an ambitious prohibition agent, is determined to take down Al Capone. In order to achieve this goal, he forms a group given the nickname “The Untouchables”.

plots.plot: Eager government guy assembles a bunch of misfit cops to annoy a crime lord with tax advice.
A straight-laced accountant wields a ledger as his weapon of choice against a tax-evading kingpin.
There’s a new club night in town, featuring violin cases, bribed bookkeepers, and really bad aim.
A group of self-righteous prudes spoil the daily plans of a much-beloved liquor distributor and his pals.
Four vintage gears grind against one slippery gangster, fueled by the power of untouched alcohol ledgers.

movies.title: Ip Man
movies.overview: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun. The film focuses on events surrounding Ip that took place in the city of Foshan between the 1930s to 1940s during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Directed by Wilson Yip, the film stars Donnie Yen in the lead role, and features fight choreography by Sammo Hung.

plots.plot: Kung fu dude beats up the visiting bullies with his fancy hand slaps and finds new fame amidst war chaos.
Fancy punch guy defends his people from uniformed aggressors when challenge duels turn into awkward war stories.
Fancy hand game becomes the latest trend as one guy teaches self-defense during a dreadful time.
A neighborhood celebrity uses unique rhythmic flailing to defeat prestige-seeking opponents from an occupied regime.
Amidst national invasion, a disciplined force-artist becomes the local legend, flipping the script on conformity with disruptive patterns.

movies.title: The Ten Commandments
movies.overview: Escaping death, a Hebrew infant is raised in a royal household to become a prince. Upon discovery of his true heritage, Moses embarks on a personal quest to reclaim his destiny as the leader and liberator of the Hebrew people.

plots.plot: A baby is found floating and grows up princely, then ditches the palace to play peak mountain magician against a pharaoh with a bad haircut.
Prince finds out he's actually a Hebrew citizen, trades silk robes for a desert sprinting outfit to play Staff vs. Spells with angry desert overlords.
Royal discovers he’s part of an ancient slave labor project and starts free seminars on parting large bodies of water.
Desert dwellers follow an ex-royal with a weather-altering stick to escape non-consensual pyramid-building careers.
Mystical janitor goes rogue, leading a labor force from bamboo tot-rafter towns in pursuit of higher management.

movies.title: The Color Purple
movies.overview: An epic tale spanning forty years in the life of Celie, an African-American woman living in the South who survives incredible abuse and bigotry. After Celie's abusive father marries her off to the equally debasing 'Mister' Albert Johnson, things go from bad to worse, leaving Celie to find companionship anywhere she can. She perseveres, holding on to her dream of one day being reunited with her sister in Africa.

plots.plot: A woman has a horrible life with abusive men, chases after happiness with jazzy songs, and dreams of escaping to a place with more zebras.
In a never-ending soap opera, a lady mail-orders endless drama, collects colorful letters, and dreams of sibling safari time.
Oppressed in a deep south monotone, a tired heroine hosts her misery party, awaiting a reunion on a distant continent.
From cooking crock to spiritual shock, days pass slowly as a woman chews through despair, hoping to board the next packet to an exotic land.
Stuck with lousy company, our heroine fakes joy through decades, starring as an endurance athlete in a slow-motion marathon of suffering.

movies.title: Train to Busan
movies.overview: When a zombie virus pushes Korea into a state of emergency, those trapped on an express train to Busan must fight for their own survival.

plots.plot: A businessman, his daughter, and a train full of passengers play dodge the zombies as they chug along to Busan.
All aboard the zombie express: one-way ticket to chaos, panicking passengers not included.
Morning commute goes from bad to undead real quick, worse than usual Monday blues.
Passengers vs. moaning latecomers, and one stop isn’t the only thing they’re dodging.
Corporate stress reliever: team-building exercise of survival, but with brainless coworkers.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.overview: Bounty hunters seek shelter from a raging blizzard and get caught up in a plot of betrayal and deception.

plots.plot: Bounty hunters get snowed in, have a nasty sleepover with a poisoner, a cop, and someone missing quite a few heads.
Snowstorm slumber party: everyone has a gun, too many have secrets, and nobody's sharing the hot cocoa.
Under a frosty roof, eight folks prove friendship, trust, and sanity can't survive claustrophobia and arsenic.
The quest for warmth is derailed when guests discover 'hospitality' involves bullet-sharing and lucky coffee.
A frosty refuge reveals that odd numbers would've been less murderous, literally opening Pandora's haberdashery.

movies.title: Amour
movies.overview: Georges and Anne are in their eighties. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, who is also a musician, lives abroad with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

plots.plot: Old music couple navigates life's last bumpy encore when one's brain decides to call it quits.
Two old folks in love hit a sour note when a brain goes on a vacation without asking.
An elderly composer composes herself after a cerebral intermission as her spouse attempts to hit the right keys during the show's awkward finale.
A note-worthy senior duet faces a silent solo when reality drops an unexpected fermata into their lives.
An octogenarian maestro orchestrates a challenging opus around a stroke-induced crescendo in their otherwise harmonious retirement riff.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.overview: When a group of idealistic young men join the German Army during the Great War, they are assigned to the Western Front, where their patriotism is destroyed by the harsh realities of combat.

plots.plot: Young, naive dudes think war is a field trip, then quickly learn it's more like a horror show with mud and bad haircuts.
Rookie soldiers sign up for glory, only to find out there's nothing romantic about dodging bullets and trench foot.
Enthusiastic recruits find that patriotic speeches don't stop shrapnel from flying or rations from sucking.
Optimistic lads discover the adventurous 'vacation' they've enlisted for is just a nonstop festival of fear and filth.
Adventurous teens embark on a journey hoping for heroism, only to discover camaraderie tastes like stale bread amidst the cacophony of chaos.

movies.title: Rain Man
movies.overview: When car dealer Charlie Babbitt learns that his estranged father has died, he returns home to Cincinnati, where he discovers that he has a savant older brother named Raymond and that his father's $3 million fortune is being left to the mental institution in which Raymond lives. Motivated by his father's money, Charlie checks Raymond out of the facility in order to return with him to Los Angeles. The brothers' cross-country trip ends up changing both their lives.

plots.plot: A selfish car salesman kidnaps his autistic brother for cash but ends up bonding over counting toothpicks.
Guy drags his math-genius sibling across America because dead dad left all the cash to the genius.
One guy can't see the forest for the trees, the other only sees numbers, but somehow they manage a road trip.
A journey featuring counting cards and counting clouds transforms a shallow dealer into something resembling human.
When the inheritance plan stalls, an unintended supporting role evolves into a savior for someone who never planned to care about anything.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.overview: Living with her tyrannical stepfather in a new home with her pregnant mother, 10-year-old Ofelia feels alone until she explores a decaying labyrinth guarded by a mysterious faun who claims to know her destiny. If she wishes to return to her real father, Ofelia must complete three terrifying tasks.

plots.plot: A little girl tries to escape her insane stepdad by doing a fantasy scavenger hunt for a goat-man.
During wartime, a kid gets roped into doing chores for a talking goat while her mom can't deal with losing WiFi.
While adults argue about politics, a child talks to pottery animals and crawls in holes to find her 'royal' self.
In post-civil chaos, a young girl believes bureaucracy means fetching slimy stuff for mythical HR managers.
Amidst political strife, a little one defies physics and authority, convinced a cave-dwelling influencer can improve her life.

movies.title: Misery
movies.overview: After an accident, acclaimed novelist Paul Sheldon is rescued by a nurse who claims to be his biggest fan.  Her obsession takes a dark turn when she holds him captive in her remote Colorado home and forces him to write back to life the popular literary character he killed off.

plots.plot: Superfan kidnaps favorite writer, turns bedroom into a writer's prison, forces him to bring her beloved book character back from the dead.
Author finds out the hard way that one does not simply kill off a beloved character, especially when a sledgehammer-wielding fan gets involved.
A novelist’s worst enemy isn’t writer’s block, but obsessive caretakers with strong opinions about how stories should end.
Trapped in the middle of a snowstorm, a writer learns that some fans will go to extraordinary lengths to see their narrative dreams come true.
A man wakes up at a new low, stuck in a remote room where he must appease the whims of a particularly brutal literary critic.

movies.title: Do the Right Thing
movies.overview: Salvatore "Sal" Fragione is the Italian owner of a pizzeria in Brooklyn. A neighborhood local, Buggin' Out, becomes upset when he sees that the pizzeria's Wall of Fame exhibits only Italian actors. Buggin' Out believes a pizzeria in a black neighborhood should showcase black actors, but Sal disagrees. The wall becomes a symbol of racism and hate to Buggin' Out and to other people in the neighborhood, and tensions rise.

plots.plot: Pizza guy refuses to change his famous wall of Italian stars, locals revolt, things get heated, pizza ends up in a weird garbage fight.
Local pizza joint becomes battleground over wall décor preferences, proving even cheese and pepperoni can't solve all problems.
Brooklyn neighborhood learns a heatwave can make tempers boil over faster than mozzarella on a pizza.
Conflicting views on celebrity representation nearly turn a pizza place into a boxing ring.
Dialogue and dough turn crispy as cultural pride and a picture wall ignite urban upheaval.

movies.title: Zootopia
movies.overview: Determined to prove herself, Officer Judy Hopps, the first bunny on Zootopia's police force, jumps at the chance to crack her first case - even if it means partnering with scam-artist fox Nick Wilde to solve the mystery.

plots.plot: A rabbit cop and a con-artist fox play detective in a world where animals wear clothes and argue over parking violations.
Fluffy cop outsmarts lazy boss by enlisting questionable partner who smells like trouble and hustling wisdom.
An overzealous vegetable eater teams up with a sly chicken-disliker to uncover a multi-species conspiracy.
Short-eared lagomorph and slyly misunderstood carnivore crack down on public safety threats made of railroads and snarl.
Ore-tough fluffy animal faces institutional prejudice while unravelling predatorial mystery tied to purple nectar.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
movies.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.

plots.plot: Three school dropouts go camping to destroy some evil jewelry while being chased by a snake-faced guy and his goth friends.
A trio takes a gap year battling evil while trying not to die, but mostly camping in the woods and complaining about a missing tent peg.
A group of teens gets way too obsessed with smashing their boss's collectibles but end up in serious forest misadventures.
Runaways armed with sticks and a book tour the wilderness arguing in pursuit of invisible objects.
Intense accessory hunters track elusive prey to save the world, engaging in outdoor survival trials and endless fashion mismatches.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.overview: It ain't easy bein' green -- especially if you're a likable (albeit smelly) ogre named Shrek. On a mission to retrieve a gorgeous princess from the clutches of a fire-breathing dragon, Shrek teams up with an unlikely compatriot -- a wisecracking donkey.

plots.plot: Smelly green dude saves a princess and makes friends with a talking donkey, because why not?
Grumpy green guy is forced to play hero when he gets roped into evicting squatters from his swamp.
Grumpy recluse with a mud fetish is dragged into fairy tale drama when a short guy wants him to be a knight.
In a world where a stubborn hermit likes his peace and quiet, an annoying talking animal becomes his best buddy.
A hermit helps a prisoner realize the outside world isn't just for perfectly formed citizens.

movies.title: Annie Hall
movies.overview: New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

plots.plot: Neurotic dude meets quirky singer and they talk so much you'd think they're both getting paid by the word.
A stand-up comic hates Los Angeles and his girlfriend a little less, until he doesn't.
He blames his high-strung romantic failures on her love of white suits and folksy music.
An obsessive analyst is haunted by ghosts of relationships past, particularly a Midwesterner allergic to change and spiders.
A pessimistic extrovert loses his stage companion to progressive tropes and California sunshine, but finds solace in room-temperature lobsters.

movies.title: Platoon
movies.overview: As a young and naive recruit in Vietnam, Chris Taylor faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

plots.plot: A rookie honeymooner in 'Nam gets caught between a buzzkill sergeant and his opposite, a jungle party boy, while trying not to die or cry every 5 minutes.
Green as a salad recruit learns that in Vietnam, good and evil get muddy like the jungle floor and his bosses couldn't be more different if they tried.
Bootcamp dropout finds himself trapped in a tropical malfunction between two philosophical opposites where bullets and ethics fly.
In an exotic land of chaos, an infantry newbie discovers the hard way that there's no right choice between orders and jungle justice.
A novice warrior's sanity unravels under the opium-hazed leadership conflict in a humid contest of human nature versus nature—literally.

movies.title: Mystic River
movies.overview: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them suffers a family tragedy.

plots.plot: Kid-turned-grumpy cop investigates best friend's daughter murder because that's what friends are for, even if it means mistakenly arresting the wrong friend.
Three childhood pals reunite over a funeral, a murder, and some old fishy secrets that nobody asked for.
Grumpy detective tries to solve a crime while old buddy thinks he's Batman out for justice, but they're both just really bad at it.
Emotionally constipated ex-friends entangle in a game of whodunit and why, with a side of trauma bonding.
A neighborhood saga of misspent youth resurfaces when a tragedy unexpectedly thaws their buried memories.

movies.title: The King's Speech
movies.overview: The King's Speech tells the story of the man who became King George VI, the father of Queen Elizabeth II. After his brother abdicates, George ('Bertie') reluctantly assumes the throne. Plagued by a dreaded stutter and considered unfit to be king, Bertie engages the help of an unorthodox speech therapist named Lionel Logue. Through a set of unexpected techniques, and as a result of an unlikely friendship, Bertie is able to find his voice and boldly lead the country into war.

plots.plot: Stuttering prince becomes king and gets yelling therapy from Aussie guy to talk better.
A posh dude practices bad words with a quirky coach to stop tripping over his own tongue.
Speech-challenged sibling unexpectedly inherits responsibility, turning to an eccentric bloke for verbal rescue.
Royal fellow with verbal issues receives unconventional lessons, ventures public speaking amidst global tensions.
Reluctant heir overcomes vocal hurdles through quirky guidance, preps for historical oration amidst formidable threats.

movies.title: The Breakfast Club
movies.overview: Five high school students from different walks of life endure a Saturday detention under a power-hungry principal. The disparate group includes rebel John, princess Claire, outcast Allison, brainy Brian and Andrew, the jock. Each has a chance to tell his or her story, making the others see them a little differently -- and when the day ends, they question whether school will ever be the same.

plots.plot: Five teenagers get stuck in detention and bond over their shared hatred of their over-the-top principal.
A jock, a nerd, a princess, a weirdo, and a punk share a Saturday of boredom and breakfast pastries.
