A quintet discovers that stereotypes don't translate well to weekend isolation with a power-crazed teacher.
In a battle of wills against a tiny dictator, five diverse individuals find common ground and possibly a future in public service announcements.
An unlikely group of claustrophobics explore identity crises while creatively defacing school property.

movies.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movies.overview: A teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

plots.plot: Poor kid wins a game show by remembering random traumatic stuff from his childhood, but nobody believes he isn't cheating.
Young guy relives his traumatic past to prove he's not a game-show fraud and hopes to win cash for love.
Orphan weathers misery while a quiz show host accuses him of being too lucky to be legal.
Man becomes charity's poster boy after recounting his dumpster fire upbringing on national TV.
Streets taught him more than textbooks, shockingly not a new curriculum but enough to stir suspicion.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.overview: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

plots.plot: Teen genius makes friends with a walking marshmallow and they recruit some nerds to fight a mask-wearing grumpy guy.
Inflatable robot, balloon buddy saves the day with a nerd squad, lots of lasers, and too many gadgets.
Squishy medical balloon helps a group of underdogs in cosplay gear battle evil.
Chubby floaty savior assists geek squad in a techy showdown against masked villainy.
Robotic healthcare bubble enlists engineering enthusiasts to confront a life-sized kabuki mask problem.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.overview: When a charming 12-year-old girl takes on the characteristics and voices of others, doctors say there is nothing they can do. As people begin to die, the girl's mother realizes her daughter has been possessed by the devil - and that her daughter's only possible hope lies with two priests and the ancient rite of demonic exorcism.

plots.plot: Little Miss Devil takes over a kid's body, spits pea soup, spins her head, and needs a priestly rescue crew.
Doctors quit when a girl's possessed by a spicy demon, so priests play ghostbusters with holy water.
A child's strange doll collection suddenly starts demanding candy, but priests think holy water will work better.
Religious guys argue whether an invisible roommate is a bad influence on their star child's vocal talents.
Gymnastics coach questions his career choice when a cosmic dance showdown occurs in a suburban bedroom.

movies.title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
movies.overview: What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.

plots.plot: A bunch of hippies throw a party at a Democratic Convention and end up in court because someone forgot to clean up the tear gas.
A judge channels his inner diva in a courtroom drama where protestors mistake the dock for a Woodstock stage.
When flower power clashes with gavel power, it's a courtroom chaos complete with eye-rolling magistrates.
70s flashback: legally blonde wigs and political shindigs lead to epic courtroom karaoke.
Rubber stamps and yippies: a courtroom tango between system cynics and law-abiding winks.

movies.title: Little Miss Sunshine
movies.overview: A family loaded with quirky, colorful characters piles into an old van and road trips to California for little Olive to compete in a beauty pageant.

plots.plot: A dysfunctional family drives cross-country in a broken van to parade their awkward kid in a beauty pageant where she dances like a happy chicken.
Hoping for a crown, a girl gets her kin to sweat through gear-shifting chaos and vehicle-freewheeling calamities.
A road trip devolves into chaos as a yellow jalopy becomes both a wrestling ring and a deep therapy session.
In pursuit of posing, giggling nerves stow away in cow-print shorts and questionable headlights toward sunny regrets.
A kaleidoscope of erratic companions scramble plans while traversing under the guise of yellow lobsters.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

plots.plot: Guy gets left on Mars, grows illegal potatoes in poop to survive, becomes the first farmer on the red planet.
Home Alone: Mars edition - one man's battle with cabbage farts and basic botany.
A desert survivor story featuring a lone botanist, a lot of fertilizer, and some very confused NASA engineers.
Laid-back space janitor gets unplanned planetary solo retreat, spends time digging in dirt and talking to himself.
Earth's remote office worker takes 'isolation' to another planet, perfecting his cooking show featuring baked goods.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.overview: The story of Nina, a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life, like all those in her profession, is completely consumed with dance. She lives with her retired ballerina mother Erica who zealously supports her daughter's professional ambition. When artistic director Thomas Leroy decides to replace prima ballerina Beth MacIntyre for the opening production of their new season, Swan Lake, Nina is his first choice.

plots.plot: Aspiring ballerina loses grip on reality while trying to nail the role of a bird, ends up getting lost in a mirror maze of paranoia.
Dancer essentially splits into two: one that's nice, and another that treats everyone like expendable props in her personal psychodrama.
Performance art turns into a literal bloodbath when feathers start to fly, both in dance rehearsals and in the protagonist's increasingly scrambled brain.
A toe-tapping spiral into madness when a high-strung performer gets a little too committed to method acting her swan song.
In a classic case of fowl-play, a hoofed human's descent into duality explodes onto stage, leading to a melancholic end but a standing ovation.

movies.title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
movies.overview: When Charlie Brown complains about the overwhelming materialism that he sees amongst everyone during the Christmas season, Lucy suggests that he become director of the school Christmas pageant. Charlie Brown accepts, but it is a frustrating struggle. When an attempt to restore the proper spirit with a forlorn little fir Christmas tree fails, he needs Linus' help to learn the meaning of Christmas.

plots.plot: Anxious kid fails at saving Christmas spirit, even with the help of a bald friend and a small tree dilemma.
Grouchy boy directs play, screws up decorations, but learns holiday secrets from blanket-clutching philosopher.
A depressed child wrangles attention-deficit friends for a festive theatrical disaster.
Discontent youth battles commercial chaos but discovers the truth hidden within a puny sapling.
Passionate yet hapless event director uncovers seasonal wisdom in the hands of a security blanket savant.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.overview: As Lord Voldemort tightens his grip on both the Muggle and wizarding worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven. Harry suspects perils may even lie within the castle, but Dumbledore is more intent upon preparing him for the final battle fast approaching. Together they work to find the key to unlock Voldemorts defenses and to this end, Dumbledore recruits his old friend and colleague Horace Slughorn, whom he believes holds crucial information. Even as the decisive showdown looms, romance blossoms for Harry, Ron, Hermione and their classmates. Love is in the air, but danger lies ahead and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

plots.plot: Boy wizard uses love potions, cheats with a magic book, and a nose-challenged villain has 99 problems but a nose ain't one.
Potion parties, diary secrets, and a goth giant gets wrecked by 13 going on 30 witchcraft gone wild.
Everyone's brewing love juice while two old dudes search for ancient trinkets and the broccoli king falls over.
A bottle-loving educator spills more secrets than a broken magic 8-ball and granny's favorite classy berry drink.
Aging academic meets fly boy over experimental liquid refreshments while cabbage-headed monarch learns to fly, unexpectedly.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.

plots.plot: A farmhand in love with a princess gets killed by an evil prince who wants to marry her, but then he's not really dead and they recruit other weirdos to fight back.
Guy becomes a pirate to impress his crush, gets involved in castle-shenanigans with a revenge-obsessed Spaniard and a giant's best buddy.
A nearly dead guy gets revived by a miracle-working squabbler and then takes on henchmen from a finger problem poster boy.
Man fakes death to avoid marrying a wannabe king, then back again like the magic show is open all night.
Masked ship captain teaches a left-handed fencing lesson before falling prey to vegetables and marsh-dwelling vermin.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.overview: Returning for his fifth year of study at Hogwarts, Harry is stunned to find that his warnings about the return of Lord Voldemort have been ignored. Left with no choice, Harry takes matters into his own hands, training a small group of students to defend themselves against the dark arts.

plots.plot: Teen boy with a lightning-bolt scar goes full rebel, forms a secret school club to fight a noseless albino villain with a snake fetish, while surviving detention with a pink-loving dictator-come-teacher.
Magic boarding school students play against an old bald guy, try to pass exams, team up with a grumpy adult for a school headache, and survive a décor disaster in pink.
Wand-waving teenagers skip homework to form a fight club against a fashion disaster who believes in control over magic education.
Juvenile wand users learn spells when an educator imposes creative limitations, leading to secret practices and a spectral courtroom face-off.
The youthful team's clandestine lessons attract ire, culminating in a basement cup retrieval, with authority challenged by unusual taste in feline-obsessed fashion.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
movies.overview: Five years have passed since Hiccup and Toothless united the dragons and Vikings of Berk. Now, they spend their time charting unmapped territories. During one of their adventures, the pair discover a secret cave that houses hundreds of wild dragons -- and a mysterious dragon rider who turns out to be Hiccup's mother, Valka. Hiccup and Toothless then find themselves at the center of a battle to protect Berk from a power-hungry warrior named Drago.

plots.plot: Dragon-loving dude reunites with lost mom who has a dragon army, then they all fight a grumpy guy with a giant angry dragon.
Dragon whisperer finds out mom left him for a dragon hippie commune, and they all have a showdown against a one-armed maniac.
Boy with reptilian BFF learns mom prefers flying lizards over family, and they collectively oppose a charismatic conqueror.
Lizard-wrangler discovers maternal instincts in a woman swinging with scales, facing off against a dreadlocked antagonist wielding a mammoth salamander.
Aerial beast tamer explores new turf, stumbles upon maternal secrets in an igloo, then fends off a nomad with a penchant for large crawlers.

movies.title: The Blind Side
movies.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

plots.plot: Big dude with terrible haircut gets adopted by a feisty rich lady, and somehow becomes a football star without tripping over his own feet.
Homeless guy becomes a family member, learns to tackle stuff more than his life's issues, and heads to the NFL where they pay him not with Oreos but real cash.
Classic tale of poor giant, clueless about sports, taken in and refurbished by a lady with a savior complex.
A silent skyscraper in shorts finds a new home and awkwardly learns his massive frame is his ticket to pile-driving opponents in college.
An underdog oversize dude lucks out when a new human GPS takes him to a field where smacking into other oversized guys is suddenly his calling.

movies.title: The Woman King
movies.overview: The story of the Agojie, the all-female unit of warriors who protected the African Kingdom of Dahomey in the 1800s with skills and a fierceness unlike anything the world has ever seen, and General Nanisca as she trains the next generation of recruits and readies them for battle against an enemy determined to destroy their way of life.

plots.plot: A fierce general trains a bunch of butt-kicking women who run around the 1800s playing 'What's That Spear?,' while trying to save their kingdom from guys who don't get 'No means no.'
A squad of women take a break from pounding fufu to pound some skulls, while their fearless leader shows them how to audition for the role of 'human weapon.'
A girl power army twirls knives, shoots arrows, and generally proves you don't need pants to protect your kingdom from mustachioed villains with bad intentions.
An African monarch's all-girl squad takes a crash course in 'Advanced Spear Throwing' to keep their home from being redecorated by unwelcome neighbors.
The no-pants squad perfects their 'don't mess with us' vibe while turning enemy heads, and necks, in defense of a trinket-exporting kingdom.

movies.title: High Noon
movies.overview: Will Kane, the sheriff of a small town in New Mexico, learns a notorious outlaw he put in jail has been freed, and will be arriving on the noon train. Knowing the outlaw and his gang are coming to kill him, Kane is determined to stand his ground, so he attempts to gather a posse from among the local townspeople.

plots.plot: A sheriff spends a whole movie begging his lazy town to help him not die when a bad guy comes back on the noon train.
Film where a dude trades in his marital bliss for an all-day guilt trip because nobody likes his badge enough to fight an old enemy.
Guy tries to crowdsource a save-my-life campaign in a town that would rather nap.
A man’s midday problem is everyone else's afternoon nap time.
This guy literally can't leave the breakfast table in peace because train schedules.

movies.title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
movies.overview: After going their separate ways, Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Velma, Daphne, and Fred reunite to investigate the ghost of Moonscar the pirate on a haunted bayou island, but it turns out the swashbuckler's spirit isn't the only creepy character on the island. The sleuths also meet up with cat creatures and zombies... and it looks like for the first time in their lives, these ghouls might actually be real.

plots.plot: Dog and friends fight zombies on vacation; surprise, they're real!
Hungry dog and his pals face real zombies for once on a spooky swamp trip.
Intrepid group reunites to debunk a legend but finds feline foes and fleshy freaks instead.
Exotic getaway turns into a cataclysmic catastrophe when things refuse to stay buried.
Gourmand with the munchies and buddies uncover a supernatural secret amidst humid habitat.

movies.title: Nosferatu
movies.overview: The mysterious Count Orlok summons Thomas Hutter to his remote Transylvanian castle in the mountains. The eerie Orlok seeks to buy a house near Hutter and his wife, Ellen. After Orlok reveals his vampire nature, Hutter struggles to escape the castle, knowing that Ellen is in grave danger. Meanwhile Orlok's servant, Knock, prepares for his master to arrive at his new home.

plots.plot: A real estate guy visits an old castle to sell a deadly house only to realize the buyer is not into sunlight and loves biting necks.
An old chap decides the perfect new digs means guzzling down some fresh blood and terrifying local ladies.
A pale aristocrat with a pronounced dental condition takes unconventional interest in real estate investment.
Fair-skinned gentleman thirsts for property and more, prompting his broker to consider a career change.
Euro businessman regrets that business trip when a potential client's hobbies start to include pest control and throat piercing.

movies.title: Mississippi Burning
movies.overview: Two FBI agents investigating the murder of civil rights workers during the 60s seek to breach the conspiracy of silence in a small Southern town where segregation divides black and white. The younger agent trained in FBI school runs up against the small town ways of his partner, a former sheriff.

plots.plot: Two FBI guys with very different haircuts show up in a racist town to solve a crime, but it's like trying to teach a cat to bark.
Rookie and grumpy cop do the southern cha-cha while hunting bad guys with funky ideals.
Government twins clash over tactics while solving a spicy mystery in a sizzling village.
Federal duo attempts to blend urban skepticism with country rhythms amidst strategic secrets.
In the heart of Dixie, two contrasting men execute a covert dance with truth in the shadows of division.

movies.title: Brazil
movies.overview: Low-level bureaucrat Sam Lowry escapes the monotony of his day-to-day life through a recurring daydream of himself as a virtuous hero saving a beautiful damsel. Investigating a case that led to the wrongful arrest and eventual death of an innocent man instead of wanted terrorist Harry Tuttle, he meets the woman from his daydream, and in trying to help her gets caught in a web of mistaken identities, mindless bureaucracy and lies.

plots.plot: Nerdy office guy dreams of being a flying superhero, falls in love with a real-life girl, but gets stuck in a bureaucratic nightmare because someone forgot a 'T' in the paperwork.
Dreamy desk jockey gets tangled in paperwork and fantasy, chasing a truck-driving lady while everyone else just stamps forms.
In a world where red tape is everyone's favorite accessory, an office guy fights rogue ducks and bureaucracy to save a woman who mostly drives her dreams in a truck.
A pencil-pushing anti-hero accidentally becomes a revolutionary by carrying out daydreams involving bad plumbing and bureaucratic misadventures.
An office warrior rides hallucinations to escape havoc caused by a typo, challenging winged complications along his paper-paved path.

movies.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
movies.overview: In the years before World War II, a penniless Japanese child is torn from her family to work as a maid in a geisha house.

plots.plot: A poor kid with pretty eyes gets sold, trains to be a geisha, and spends years hoping a guy who bought her a popsicle will notice her.
A girl goes from housekeeper to cultural entertainer while navigating mean girls and her crush who weirdly inspires her life choices after one nice gesture.
A talented dancer learns the fans and makeup game, only to find love and rivalries are just as painted and fragile as her foundation.
In the leadup to a global smackdown, a girl journey from underdog to top performer, all because a gentleman gave her a charming glimpse of kindness.
In a performer's world, a small town girl uses balance and beauty to conquer takeover attempts and unlock a favor that changes her dynamic forever.

movies.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
movies.overview: Gilbert Grape is a small-town young man with a lot of responsibility. Chief among his concerns are his mother, who is so overweight that she can't leave the house, and his mentally impaired younger brother, Arnie, who has a knack for finding trouble. Settled into a job at a grocery store and an ongoing affair with local woman Betty Carver, Gilbert finally has his life shaken up by the free-spirited Becky.

plots.plot: Young man balances helping his large, couch-bound mom, babysitting his chaos-loving brother, and juggling scandalous grocery store romance while a new hippie girl rolls into town.
Guy stuck in a dead-end job takes care of heavy-duty mom and a mischief-making sibling until a wildly adventurous girl gives him a wakeup call.
A supermarket employee moonlights in affairs and wrangles a trouble-seeking sidekick until a wandering spirit arrives to shake things up.
Forced to be the glue for a family full of challenges while dealing with personal entanglements, a man finds unexpected direction from a transient visitor.
In Middle America, a man's mundane life of tending to an immovable matriarch and a chaotic apprentice flips when a nomadic free-thinker disrupts the routine.

movies.title: The Warriors
movies.overview: Prominent gang leader Cyrus calls a meeting of New York's gangs to set aside their turf wars and take over the city. At the meeting, a rival leader kills Cyrus, but a Coney Island gang called the Warriors is wrongly blamed for Cyrus' death. Before you know it, the cops and every gangbanger in town is hot on the Warriors' trail.

plots.plot: A bunch of dudes with no MetroCard must dodge more psychos than Times Square on New Year’s Eve after being framed for killing a gang boss.
Guys from Coney Island take the longest route home ever, chased by every lunatic in New York while making designer vests look tough.
Concert-enthusiast narrator catches heat for unexpected emceeing exit, leading to impromptu city marathon with high stakes.
Sandmen on the lam get unsolicited exercise via eclectic city tour, dodging paint-obsessed enthusiasts among others.
Ocean-bordering sprinters navigate hostile cats, zoo escapees, and an 8-mile nocturnal kaleidoscope.

movies.title: The Hustler
movies.overview: Fast Eddie Felson is a small-time pool hustler with a lot of talent but a self-destructive attitude. His bravado causes him to challenge the legendary Minnesota Fats to a high-stakes match.

plots.plot: Fast Eddie challenges a pool shark, loses a ton of cash, but at least learns the ancient art of sucking less.
Pool hustler's ego writes checks his skills can't cash, ends up at the magical no-money billiards club.
Arrogant cue enthusiast bets it all on draining balls into holes and gets schooled by a relentless legend.
Overconfident cue sport devotee plays emotional billiards with destructive outcomes.
Unrestrained table game aficionado tests his potential against an iconic potting expert in a contest of dubious self-worth.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.overview: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police, a young marine biologist, and a grizzled hunter embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again.

plots.plot: When a beach town can't keep a giant fish from turning its locals into sushi, the sheriff teams up with a fish nerd and a crusty fisherman to take down the seafood platter from hell.
A gigantic water beast gets tired of a vacation town blocking its summer swim path and decides to teach them a lesson in not annoying nature.
It turns out swimming pools are safer than the ocean, especially when the ocean has teeth and is hungry.
An aquatic creature, originally thought more dangerous than mythical beasts, ends up being exactly as dangerous when a community plays its victim.
An oversized underwater resident demonstrates why domestication was never an option for their species, turning a local's worst fear into unforgettable knowledge.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.overview: In the post-apocalyptic future, reigning tyrannical supercomputers teleport a cyborg assassin known as the "Terminator" back to 1984 to kill Sarah Connor, whose unborn son is destined to lead insurgents against 21st century mechanical hegemony. Meanwhile, the human-resistance movement dispatches a lone warrior to safeguard Sarah. Can he stop the virtually indestructible killing machine?

plots.plot: Buff dude from the future travels back in time to wear sunglasses at night and hunt a waitress to prevent her super-son from existing.
Future fashion model arrives with one mission: wipe out a lady to stop her kid from causing a robo-apocalypse, but forgets to put on pants first.
Time-traveling fashionista uses his Austrian charm and a delightful catchphrase to try and ruin the day for one plucky mom-to-be.
A metallic bodybuilder from tomorrow checks into today with a grim task – and a penchant for leather jackets.
Muscle-bound machine with a glitch in the mission makes a cold call in the 80s to rearrange history's family tree.

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.overview: Chuck Nolan, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home.

plots.plot: FedEx guy becomes a beach bum after crash-landing, befriends a ball, and talks to himself until he grows a killer beard.
Delivery dude gets stranded, turns lone hermit, and makes new BFF out of a volleyball.
Corporate workaholic discovers secluded island makeover after unscheduled water landing. Volleyball included.
A logistics manager fails to fulfill a rush-hour delivery due to aquatic isolation inconvenience.
An executive experiences intense product testing in the South Pacific for years, with self-dialogue and leather goods.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

plots.plot: Guy in a bat costume realizes his dad wasn’t as squeaky clean as he thought while playing cat and mouse with a nerd who loves question marks.
A caped introvert discovers his family values are more corrupt than reruns of reality TV, all while failing to catch a sociopath with a knack for puzzles.
Wannabe superhero with surname like a flying rodent faces green-pajama-loving villain, exposing city’s dirt and dad’s skeletons.
Masked vigilante with insomnia faces a cryptic enthusiast who loves cryptograms, uncovering family secrets and municipal clumsiness.
Dark-dressed grump with an aversion to social gatherings stumbles upon paternal murkiness while thwarted by conundrum-obsessed adversary.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.overview: After the cataclysmic events in New York with The Avengers, Steve Rogers, aka Captain America is living quietly in Washington, D.C. and trying to adjust to the modern world. But when a S.H.I.E.L.D. colleague comes under attack, Steve becomes embroiled in a web of intrigue that threatens to put the world at risk. Joining forces with the Black Widow, Captain America struggles to expose the ever-widening conspiracy while fighting off professional assassins sent to silence him at every turn. When the full scope of the villainous plot is revealed, Captain America and the Black Widow enlist the help of a new ally, the Falcon. However, they soon find themselves up against an unexpected and formidable enemy—the Winter Soldier.

plots.plot: Patriotic popsicle teams up with badass spy and birdman to stop his brainwashed best bud from joining a Nazi-themed world domination club.
An unfrozen war hero realizes his best friend didn't just survive a fall, he became a brainwashed bionic menace working for secret Nazi enthusiasts.
A 95-year-old super soldier throws a Frisbee at a metal-armed guy while trying to adapt to smartphones and freedom fries.
Vintage shield enthusiast discovers sinister tentacle organization has infiltrated his fancy intelligence agency, making it hard to trust his coworkers.
After playing popsicle during the Cold War, a patriotic museum exhibit fights an arm-wrestling enthusiast in a plot involving airships and data caches.

movies.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
movies.overview: Holly Golightly is an eccentric New York City playgirl determined to marry a Brazilian millionaire. But when young writer Paul Varjak moves into her apartment building, her past threatens to get in their way.

plots.plot: A city girl with a cat obsession and a talent for charming rich dudes falls for her broke neighbor who writes for free.
Frisky Manhattan socialite fills time with parties and plotting her millionaire wedding, but complicates things with a broke writer living upstairs.
An aspiring gentleman diver takes on a flamboyant gem hunter, but only ends up with a rabid feline accomplice.
Eccentric hat enthusiast attends every party in town to escape milk drinker neighbor who can't pay rent.
Nomadic urbanite dances through jiggly businessman pyramid schemes and distracts praise-jockey, imploding both destinies.

movies.title: All the President's Men
movies.overview: During the 1972 elections, two reporters' investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Nixon to resign from his post.

plots.plot: Two guys uncover a big bad secret that makes a president quit his job, all while they get bossed around by a newspaper editor.
Journalists dig up dirt on a bungled break-in that ends up unseating a dude with a fancy office in DC.
Two typewriter jockeys take down the leader of the free world with the power of nosiness and coffee.
News nerds crack a scandal wide open, causing the White House's top tenant to pack his bags.
Pen-pushing pair shake the political tree, causing the nation's chief to fall out.

movies.title: Eddie Murphy: Delirious
movies.overview: Taped live and in concert at Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C. in August, 1983, Eddie Murphy: Delirious captures Eddie Murphy's wild and outrageous stand-up comedy act, which he performed in New York and eighteen other cities across the U.S. to standing-room-only audiences. Eddie's comedy was groundbreaking, completely new, razor sharp and definitely funny.Eddie Murphy pontificates in his own vulgarly hilarious fashion on everything from bizarre sexual fantasies to reliving the family barbecue, and is peppered with Eddie's one-of-a-kind wit. Laugh along as Eddie reminiscences of hot childhood days and the ice cream man intermixed with classic vocal parodies of top American entertainers.Experience Eddie Murphy at his best, live and red hot! Delirious! Uncensored and Uncut!

plots.plot: Comedian struts in leather, dishes out raunchy family stories, and impersonates pop stars for laughs.
A man in tight clothes mocks ice cream trucks and celebrity voices in front of cheering fans.
A loud performer shares his thoughts on summer sweets and household antics in a vast hall.
Comic rants about frozen treats and dramatizes famous figures' voices amid uproarious laughter.
Dynamic individual captures their energetic essence while recounting peculiar youth memories.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.overview: In the boorish city of Agrabah, kind-hearted street urchin Aladdin and Princess Jasmine fall in love, although she can only marry a prince. He and power-hungry Grand Vizier Jafar vie for a magic lamp that can fulfill their wishes.

plots.plot: A poor guy scores a magical sugar daddy in a lamp, scams his way into royalty, and still ends up being a good dude.
Guy with a pet monkey gets a genie that falls out of a lamp, wishes for a new look and a princess, while a bad guy wants the same genie to overhaul his creepy basement.
A dude becomes royalty thanks to a boisterous focus-group-tested servant from a tiny house but soon discovers the high-pressure world of politics and wants out.
A small-time bread thief briefly becomes the CEO of a sand kingdom with vague aspirations involving a tower, a girl, and an oversized pet.
A con artist turns the power dynamic in a sultanate through an ancestral heirloom, only to deal with organizational chaos, ethical dilemmas, and a temporary eviction.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.overview: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

plots.plot: Rich playboy is kidnapped by bad guys, builds a shiny metal suit in a cave, flies home, and then starts a part-time gig of saving the world.
Billionaire nearly blown up by his own stuff decides to switch careers from arms dealer to armored vigilante with serious A-grade tech skills.
Guy with a glowing chest battery wakes up in a desert and decides repurposing scrap metal into fashion is the vibe after all.
Corporate titan detours from his empire to test out his welding skills in extreme circumstances and inadvertently starts a trend in superhero couture.
Experimental technology enthusiast turns midlife crisis into high-flying aluminum fashion statement, collecting a few traffic violations along the way.

movies.title: The Graduate
movies.overview: Benjamin, a recent college graduate very worried about his future, finds himself in a love triangle with an older woman and her daughter.

plots.plot: Awkward college grad ends up in the weirdest love triangle ever with a wine-loving cougar and her not-so-loving daughter.
Confused grad gets lectured on pool parties, seduction, and why dating your mom's BFF is a bad idea.
Clumsy post-grad succumbs to spontaneous swimming and lectures on plastic things while being a secretive heartbreaker.
A dithering ex-student awkwardly stumbles into midlife crises and whispers of future prospects while dodging family drama.
An aimless alumni seeks meaningful employment but stumbles upon awkward aquatic adventures and clandestine connections.

movies.title: Godzilla
movies.overview: Japan is thrown into a panic after several ships are sunk near Odo Island. An expedition to the island led by Dr. Kyohei Yamane soon discover something far more devastating than imagined in the form of a 50 meter tall monster whom the natives call Gojira. Now the monster begins a rampage that threatens to destroy not only Japan, but the rest of the world as well.

plots.plot: Giant radioactive lizard crashes Japan, stomping everything while scientists run around screaming and wondering why their bug spray doesn't work.
Big ol' dinosaur gets bored in the ocean, decides Japan looks like a tasty snack, and goes on a sushi-free diet of pure chaos.
Scales over sales: When a prehistoric diva throws a seaside tantrum, crisis becomes Japan's hottest export.
Eco-binge gone wrong: A colossal creature rises, mistaking Tokyo for a lost playground of ancient times.
Relic of the atomic age misreads island solitude as a mere buffet invite, turns cityscape into its unchosen salad bar.
